    10                                  ;	   ((nasm ibmbio7.s -l ibmbio7.txt -o IBMBIO.COM -Z error.txt))
    11                                  ;					   -o IBMBIO7.BIN 	
    12                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    13                                  
    14                                  ; 12/09/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 Kernel -dosbios- ('ibmbio7.s')
    15                                  ; Modified from 'iosys6.s' (11/09/2023, Retro DOS v4.2 Kernel's IO.SYS) file
    16                                  ; as below:
    17                                  ;
    18                                  ;    1) Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS is based on disassembled source code
    19                                  ;	of MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, derived using MSDOS 6.0 source code.
    20                                  ;
    21                                  ;    2) Labels, names, comments, explanations and structure definitions
    22                                  ;	about procedures and code details are almost entirely taken from
    23                                  ;	the original MSDOS 6.0 source code, except for the details that
    24                                  ;	Erdogan Tan personally experienced. Some of them are incompatible
    25                                  ;	with PCDOS 7.1 code. But they have not been deleted to preserve
    26                                  ;	the originality of the descriptions.)
    27                                  ;
    28                                  ;    3)'ibmbio7.s' contains the BIOSLOADER (MSLOADER) section located in
    29                                  ;	the 1st 4 sectors of the IBMBIO.COM file on disk. This is a method
    30                                  ;	from older DOS versions (3 sectors for MSDOS 6.22).
    31                                  ;	The MSDOS/PCDOS boot sector code only reads these MSLOADER/BIOSLOADER
    32                                  ;	sectors and transfers control to the MSLOADER/BIOSLOADER code.
    33                                  ;	BUT!!! The Retro DOS v3 (& v5) boot sector code loads the entire
    34                                  ;	MSDOS.SYS/PCDOS.SYS -combined- kernel file into memory at once.
    35                                  ;	So, hence the Retro DOS boot sector code, 'retrodos5.s' file
    36                                  ;       contains slightly different IO.SYS/IBMBIO.COM INITialization code
    37                                  ;	than the original PCDOS/MSDOS. It does not include 
    38                                  ;	the MSLOADER/BIOSLOADER section. The 'retrodos5.s' and 'ibmbio7.s'
    39                                  ;	files are almost identical except their INIT codes.)
    40                                  ;
    41                                  ; ('iosys6.s' has been converted to 'ibmbio7.s' and 'retrodos42.s' has been
    42                                  ; converted to 'retrodos5.s'. 'ibmbio7.s' is IBMBIO.COM source code file
    43                                  ; while 'retrodos5.s' is source code of Retro DOS v5 kernel file 'PCDOS.SYS'.
    44                                  ; 'retrodos5.s' includes 'ibmdos7.bin' or IBMDOS.COM as binary file.)
    45                                  		
    46                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    47                                  
    48                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Multisection binary file format (BIOSDATA & BIOSCODE sections)
    49                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan (Istanbul)
    50                                  
    51                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    52                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    53                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    54                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    55                                        
    56                                  ;---- Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    57                                  ;     at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    58                                  ;     moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    59                                  ;     Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    60                                  ;     SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    61                                  ;     (MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    62

    92                                  ;=============================================================================
    93                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (IO.SYS) LOADER SECTION 
    94                                  ;=============================================================================
    95                                  ; 12/09/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
    96                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
    97                                  ;non-contiguous io.sys loader (msload) ((MSDOS 6.0 source: MSLOAD.ASM, 1991))
    98                                  
    99                                  section .MSLOAD ; vstart=0 ;; .BIOSLOAD 
   100                                  
   101                                  ; ===========================================================================
   102                                  
   103                                  ; 09/12/2022
   104                                  ; Comments are from MSDOS 6.0 MSLOAD.ASM (1991) & HEX-RAYS IDA disasm output
   105                                  
   106                                  ; ===========================================================================
   107                                  ;	NOTE: The boot loader should be verifying that the first
   108                                  ;	  block of io.sys is, in fact, at cluster 2. This would be saving
   109                                  ;	  a whole lot of time during system debugging.
   110                                  ;
   111                                  ;============================================================================
   112                                  ;
   113                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   114                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   115                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   116                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   117                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   118                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   119                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   120                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   121                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the
   122                                  ;	     extention of msboot program.
   123                                  ;
   124                                  ; ===========================================================================
   125                                  
   126                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   127                                  ;
   128                                  ; M056 : Added RPL support, so that RPL's fake INT 13 code can be safe from
   129                                  ;		SYSINIT & transient portion of COMMAND.COM
   130                                  ;
   131                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
   132                                  		
   133                                  		[ORG 0]			; segment 0x0070h
   134                                  
   135                                  START$:
   136 00000000 EB45                    		jmp	short SaveInputValues	; 13/09/2023
   137 00000002 90                      		nop	; 13/09/2023
   138                                  %if 0

   140                                  ; 09/12/2022
   141                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   142                                  SysVersion:	dw 5			; expected_version	
   143                                  ;MyStacks:	db 256 dup(0)		; local stack
   144                                  ; 22/12/2022
   145                                  ; 20/12/2022
   146                                  ;MyStacks:	dw 102 dup(0)		; local stack
   147                                  NumHeads:	dw 0			; ...
   148                                  ClusterSize:	db 2 dup(0)		; ...
   149                                  StartSecL:	dw 0			; ...
   150                                  StartSecH:	dw 0			; ...
   151                                  TempH:		dw 0			; for 32 bit calculation
   152                                  TempCluster:	db 2 dup(0)		; temporary place for cluster number
   153                                  LastFatSector:	db 2 dup(0FFh)		; fat sec # start from 1st FAT entry
   154                                  SectorCount:	dw 0			; ...
   155                                  SecPerFat:	dw 0			; ...
   156                                  HiddenSectorsL:	dw 0			; ...
   157                                  HiddenSectorsH:	dw 0			; ...
   158                                  BytesPerSec:	dw 0			; ...
   159                                  ReservSectors:	db 2 dup(0)		; ...
   160                                  CurrentCluster:	db 2 dup(0)		; ...
   161                                  NextBioLocation: db 2 dup(0)		; ...
   162                                  FirstSectorL:	dw 0			; ...
   163                                  FirstSectorH:	dw 0			; ...
   164                                  TotalSectorsL:	dw 0			; max. number of sectors
   165                                  TotalSectorsH:	dw 0			; ...
   166                                  SecPerTrack:	db 2 dup(0)		; ...
   167                                  BootDrive:	db 0			; ...
   168                                  Fatsize:	db 0			; ...
   169                                  MediaByte:	db 0			; ...
   170                                  EndOfFile:	db 0			; ...

   172                                  FatSegment:	db 2 dup(0)		; ...
   173                                  SecPerCluster:	db 0			; ...
   174                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   175                                  %endif

   183                                  ;SysVersion:	dw 5			; expected_version	
   184 00000003 07                      SysVersionMajor: db 7	; Retro DOS v5.0 (IBM PCDOS 7.1)
   185 00000004 0A                      SysVersionMinor: db 10
   186 00000005 0000                    ClusterSize:	dw 0
   187 00000007 0000                    StartSecL:	dw 0
   188 00000009 0000                    StartSecH:	dw 0
   189 0000000B 0000                    TempH:		dw 0			; for 32 bit calculation
   190                                  ;TempCluster:	dw 0
   191 0000000D FFFF                    LastFatSectorL:	dw 0FFFFh		; fat sec # start from 1st FAT entry
   192 0000000F FFFF                    LastFatSectorH:	dw 0FFFFh		; fat sec # start from 1st FAT entry
   193 00000011 0000                    SectorCount:	dw 0
   194                                  CurrentCluster:	
   195                                  		; 06/10/2023
   196                                  CurrentClusterL:
   197 00000013 0000                    		dw 0
   198                                  CurrentClusterH:
   199 00000015 0000                    		dw 0	; 13/09/2023 - HW of FAT32 cluster number
   200 00000017 0000                    BytesPerSec:	dw 0
   201 00000019 0000                    SecPerCluster:	dw 0
   202                                  		; 13/09/2023
   203 0000001B 0000                    ReservSectors:	dw 0
   204 0000001D 0000                    NumFats:	dw 0
   205 0000001F 0000                    RootEntCnt:	dw 0
   206 00000021 0000                    SecPerTrack:	dw 0
   207 00000023 0000                    NumHeads:	dw 0
   208 00000025 0000                    HiddenSectorsL:	dw 0			
   209 00000027 0000                    HiddenSectorsH:	dw 0			
   210 00000029 0000                    TotalSectorsL:	dw 0			; max. number of sectors
   211 0000002B 0000                    TotalSectorsH:	dw 0
   212 0000002D 0000                    FATSectorsL:	dw 0
   213 0000002F 0000                    FATSectorsH:	dw 0
   214 00000031 0000                    RootClusterL:	dw 0
   215 00000033 0000                    RootClusterH:	dw 0
   216                                  FirstCluster:	; 06/10/2023
   217 00000035 0000                    FirstClusterL:	dw 0
   218 00000037 0000                    FirstClusterH:	dw 0
   219                                  		;
   220 00000039 0000                    FirstSectorL:	dw 0
   221 0000003B 0000                    FirstSectorH:	dw 0
   222 0000003D 00                      BootDrive:	db 0
   223 0000003E 00                      FatType:	db 0
   224 0000003F 00                      MediaByte:	db 0
   225 00000040 00                      EndOfFile:	db 0
   226 00000041 00000000                OrgDasdPtr:	dd 0
   227                                  		; 06/10/2023
   228                                  ;FatStartSecL:	dw 0
   229                                  ;FatStartSecH:	dw 0
   230 00000045 0000                    FatSegment:	dw 0
   231                                  		; 05/10/2023
   232                                  ;NextBioLocation:
   233                                  	; 05/10/2023 (bp register will be used instead of [NextBioLocation])
   234                                  		;dw 0
   235                                  
   236                                  		; 13/09/2023
   237                                  
   238                                  ; SaveInputValues
   239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   240                                  ; INPUT:     none
   241                                  ;
   242                                  ;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
   243                                  ;   ch = media byte
   244                                  ;   bx = first data sector (low) on disk (0-based)
   245                                  ;   ds:si = original rom bios diskette parameter table.
   246                                  ;
   247                                  ; if an extended boot record, then ax will be the first data sector
   248                                  ; high word. save ax and set FirstSectorH according to ax if it is an
   249                                  ; extended boot record.
   250                                  ;
   251                                  ;   ax = first data sector (high) on disk ;
   252                                  ; OUTPUT:
   253                                  ;
   254                                  ;   bx = first data sector on disk
   255                                  ;
   256                                  ;   MediaByte = input ch
   257                                  ;   BootDrive = input dl
   258                                  ;   FirstSectorL = input bx
   259                                  ;   FirstSectorH = input ax, if an extended boot record.;j.k.
   260                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.
   261                                  ;   TotalSectorsH = high word of the above
   262                                  ;   HiddenSectorsL = hidden secotrs
   263                                  ;   HiddenSectorsH
   264                                  ;   ReservSectors = reserved sectors
   265                                  ;   SecPerTrack = sectors/track
   266                                  ;   NumHeads = heads/cylinder
   267                                  ;
   268                                  ;   ds = 0
   269                                  ;   AX,DX,SI destroyed
   270                                  ;
   271                                  ; calls:     none
   272                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   273                                  ;FUNCTION:
   274                                  ; save input information and bpb informations from the boot record.
   275                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   276                                  
   277                                  Sec9 equ 522h
   278                                  ; 20/12/2022	
   279                                  DskAddr	equ 1Eh*4 ; 78h
   280                                  ; 22/12/2022
   281                                  ;StackPtr equ MyStacks+(NumHeads-MyStacks)
   282                                  
   283                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   284                                  
   285                                  		; 13/09/2023
   286                                  		; (registers from PCDOS 7.1 boot sector)
   287                                  		; ss = 0
   288                                  		; sp = 7BE4h
   289                                  		;	[0:7BE4h] = ss:bx = 0:78h (1Eh vector)
   290                                  		;	[0:7BE8h] = ds:si = DSK_PARMS (INT 1Eh) table address	
   291                                  		; bp = 7BECh
   292                                  		; ds = 0
   293                                  		; ax:bx = absolute disk address for cluster 2 (data start)
   294                                  		;	= dword/far ptr [0:7BFCh]
   295                                  		; es = ax	
   296                                  		; dl = [BootDrv] = [7C40h] ; !FAT32 BPB!
   297                                  		; ch = [MediaByte] = [7C15h]
   298                                  		; ds:si = rom bios disk(ette) params table address (INT 1Eh)
   299                                  		;	= [0:7BE8h] = 0:7BECh
   300                                  		;	(ds:si is also in stack, at [0:7BE8h])
   301                                  		; 0:500h = root dir buffer (1st sector of the root dir)
   302                                  		; [0:7Eh] = disk(ette) params table address = 0:7BECh
   303                                  		;	   (head settle time = 15ms) 
   304                                  
   305                                  SaveInputValues:
   306                                  		; 13/09/2023 (Retro DOS v5 MSLOADER/BIOSLOADER)
   307 00000047 8CDF                    		mov	di, ds ; DSK_PARMS (INT 1Eh) table segment
   308                                  
   309                                  		; 24/12/2022 (Retro DOS v4 MSLOADER)
   310 00000049 0E                      		push	cs
   311 0000004A 1F                      		pop	ds 
   312                                  		;mov	[cs:FirstSectorL], bx ; first data sector (low word)
   313                                  		;mov	[cs:MediaByte], ch
   314                                  		;mov	[cs:BootDrive], dl
   315                                  		; 13/09/2023
   316 0000004B 891E[3900]              		mov	[FirstSectorL], bx
   317 0000004F A3[3B00]                		mov	[FirstSectorH], ax
   318 00000052 891E[0700]              		mov	[StartSecL], bx ; **!**
   319 00000056 A3[0900]                		mov	[StartSecH], ax ; **!!**
   320 00000059 882E[3F00]              		mov	[MediaByte], ch
   321 0000005D 8816[3D00]              		mov	[BootDrive], dl
   322                                  
   323                                  		; 13/09/2023
   324                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 MSLOAD:0058h)
   325                                  		;pop	si	
   326                                  		;pop	ds
   327                                  		;	; from BS code..
   328                                  		;	; ss:sp = 0:7BE4h, bp = 7BECh
   329                                  		;	; Clear stack and load disk parameters table in ds:si
   330                                  		;	;
   331                                  		;	; pop.. Original INT 1Eh vector address
   332                                  		;pop	si
   333                                  		;pop	ds
   334                                  		;	; pop.. Original INT 1Eh disk table address
   335                                  
   336                                  		; 13/09/2023
   337                                  		; Note: DS:SI -from BS- points to DSK_PARMS (INT 1Eh) tbl addr
   338                                  		; (no need to pop/take address from stack)
   339                                  
   340                                  		;mov	sp, bp ; sp = 7BECh
   341                                  
   342                                  		; sp = 7BE4h
   343                                  
   344                                  		; 13/09/2023
   345                                  		; Save original (ROMBIOS) DSK_PARMS table address 
   346 00000061 8936[4100]              		mov	[OrgDasdPtr], si   ; DSK_PARMS (INT 1Eh) tbl offset	
   347 00000065 893E[4300]              		mov	[OrgDasdPtr+2], di ; DSK_PARMS (INT 1Eh) tbl segment
   348                                  
   349 00000069 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx		; segment 0 (obviously)
   350 0000006B 8ED9                    		mov	ds, cx		; ZERO
   351                                  		; 13/09/2023
   352 0000006D 8EC1                    		mov	es, cx
   353 0000006F 57                      		push	di
   354 00000070 BF2205                  		mov	di, Sec9
   355 00000073 893E7800                		mov	[DskAddr], di	; [mov 78h], di ; 522h
   356 00000077 890E7A00                		mov	[DskAddr+2], cx ; [mov 7Ah], cx ; 0
   357 0000007B 1F                      		pop	ds
   358 0000007C B10E                    		mov	cl, 14		; (11+3 bytes for IBM rombios)
   359 0000007E FC                      		cld
   360 0000007F F3A4                    		rep movsb		; copy table
   361                                  		; 20/12/2022
   362 00000081 8ED9                    		mov	ds, cx ; 0
   363                                  		; 23/12/2022
   364                                  		; es = 0
   365                                  		; ds = 0
   366                                  		; ss = 0
   367                                  
   368                                  		; 13/09/2023
   369                                  		;mov	cx, [051Ah]	; LW of IBMBIO.COM (IO.SYS) first cluster
   370                                  		;mov	[cs:CurrentCluster], cx
   371                                  		;mov	cx, [0514h]	; HW of IBMBIO.COM (IO.SYS) first cluster
   372                                  		;mov	[cs:CurrentCluster+2], cx
   373                                  ; 24/12/2022
   374                                  %if 0
   375                                  		mov	cx, [7C0Bh] 	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_bytespersector
   376                                  		mov	[cs:BytesPerSec], cx
   377                                  		mov	cl, [7C0Dh]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_sectorspercluster
   378                                  		mov	[cs:SecPerCluster], cl
   379                                  		mov	cx, [7C18h]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_sectorspertrack	
   380                                  		mov	[cs:SecPerTrack], cx
   381                                  		mov	cx, [7C1Ah]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_heads
   382                                  		mov	[cs:NumHeads], cx
   383                                  		;mov	cx, [7C16h]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_sectorsperfat
   384                                  		;mov	[cs:SecPerFat], cx
   385                                  		; 13/09/2023
   386                                  		mov	dx, [7C16h]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_sectorsperfat
   387                                  		;mov	[cs:FATSectorsL], dx
   388                                  		mov	bl, [7C26h]	; BS_BootSig ; (FAT12 and FAT16)
   389                                  		or	dx, dx ; **
   390                                  		jnz	short not_fat32
   391                                  		mov	bl, [7C42h]	; BS_BootSig ; (FAT32) 
   392                                  not_fat32:
   393                                  		mov	cl, [7C10h]	; BPB_NumFATs
   394                                  		mov	[cs:NumFats], cl
   395                                  		mov	cx, [7C11h]	; BPB_RootEntCnt
   396                                  		mov	[cs:RootEntCnt], cx
   397                                  		;
   398                                  		mov	cx, [7C0Eh]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_reservedsectors	
   399                                  		mov	[cs:ReservSectors], cx
   400                                  		mov	cx, [7C1Ch]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_hiddensectors
   401                                  		mov	[cs:HiddenSectorsL], cx
   402                                  		mov	cx, [7C13h]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_totalsectors
   403                                  		mov	[cs:TotalSectorsL], cx
   404                                  
   405                                  		; First of all, check if it the boot record is an extended one.
   406                                  		; This is just a safe guard in case some user just "copy" the
   407                                  		; 4.00 iosys.com to a media with a conventional boot record.
   408                                  
   409                                  		; 22/12/2022
   410                                  		;cmp	byte [7C26h], 29h ; ext_boot_signature
   411                                  		; 13/09/2023
   412                                  		cmp	bl, 29h
   413                                  		jne	short Relocate	; old boot sector
   414                                  					; no need to copy high words
   415                                  		mov	[cs:FirstSectorH], ax ; Start sector # of data, high word
   416                                  		mov	ax, [7C1Eh]	; BPB_HiddSec+2
   417                                  		mov	[cs:HiddenSectorsH], ax
   418                                  		; 10/12/2022
   419                                  		or	cx, cx
   420                                  		;cmp	cx, 0		; cx set already before (=totalsectors)
   421                                  		; 22/12/2022
   422                                  		;jnz	short Relocate
   423                                  		; 13/09/2023
   424                                  		jnz	short not_big
   425                                  		mov	ax, [7C20h]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_bigtotalsectors
   426                                  		mov	[cs:TotalSectorsL], ax
   427                                  		mov	ax, [7C22h]	; BootSector.ext_boot_bpb.BPB_bigtotalsectors+2
   428                                  		mov	[cs:TotalSectorsH], ax
   429                                  		; 13/09/2023
   430                                  not_big:	
   431                                  		;cmp	word [cs:FATsectorsL], 0
   432                                  		and	dx, dx ; **
   433                                  		jnz	short Relocate	; FAT12 or FAT16 fs
   434                                  
   435                                    		mov     cx, [7C24h]	; BPB_FATSz32 ; FAT32 fs
   436                                  		mov     [cs:FATSectorsL], cx
   437                                  		mov     cx, [7C26h]	; BPB_FATSz32+2
   438                                  		mov     [cs:FATSectorsH], cx
   439                                  		mov     cx, [7C2Ch]	; BPB_RootClus
   440                                  		mov     [cs:RootClusterL], cx
   441                                  		mov     cx, [7C2Eh]    ; BPB_RootClus+2
   442                                  		mov     [cs:RootClusterH], cx
   443                                  %endif
   444                                  		; 13/09/2023 - Erdogan Tan - Istanbul
   445                                  		;
   446                                  		; Note: Boot signature check has been removed because
   447                                  		;	it is not possible to start/run IBMBIO.COM
   448                                  		;	if it would not be a valid FAT32 (or compatible) boot sector

   523                                  ; Relocate
   524                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   525                                  ;
   526                                  ; NOTES:
   527                                  ;
   528                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   529                                  ;
   530                                  ; INPUT:     none
   531                                  ;
   532                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   533                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   534                                  ;
   535                                  ; calls:     none
   536                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   537                                  ;
   538                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   539                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   540                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   541                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   542                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   543                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   544                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   545                                  ;
   546                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   547                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   548                                  ;
   549                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   550                                  ;
   551                                  ; jump to relocated code
   552                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   553                                  
   554                                  		; 14/09/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 BIOSLOADER/MSLOADER
   555                                  		;			      PCDOS 7.1
   556                                  Relocate:
   557                                  		; 24/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4 (4.0 & 4.1 & 4.2) MSLOADER
   558                                  		;			     MSDOS 5.0 & 5.0+ & 6.22 (6.21)
   559                                  		
   560                                  		;cld
   561                                  
   562 000000C0 31F6                    		xor	si, si
   563 000000C2 89F7                    		mov	di, si
   564 000000C4 CD12                    		int	12h		; MEMORY SIZE -
   565                                  					; Return: AX = number of contiguous 1K blocks of memory
   566 000000C6 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
   567 000000C8 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl		; Memory size in paragraphs
   568                                  
   569                                  ;------ Check if an RPL program is present at TOM and do not tromp over it
   570                                  
   571                                  		; 10/12/2022

   679                                  ; FindClusterSize

   723                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.

   726                                  ;

   730                                  ;   all other registers destroyed

   732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   733                                  
   734                                  CalcFatSize:
   735                                  		; 14/09/2023 (Retro DOS v5, PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM LOADER)
   736                                  		; 24/12/2022 (Retro DOS v4, MSDOS 5.0-6.22 IO.SYS LOADER)
   737                                  
   738 00000129 A3[0500]                		mov	[ClusterSize], ax ; cluster size in bytes	
   739

   742                                  		;mov	byte [Fatsize], 1; FAT_12_BIT (assume)	
   743                                  		; 14/09/2023

   745                                  		
   746                                  		;mov	dx, [TotalSectorsH]
   747                                  		;mov	ax, [TotalSectorsL] ; DX:AX = total disk sectors
   748                                  		; 14/09/2023
   749 00000131 A1[2B00]                		mov	ax, [TotalSectorsH]
   750 00000134 8B1E[2900]              		mov	bx, [TotalSectorsL] ; AX:BX = total disk sectors
   751                                  ; 14/09/2023
   752                                  %if 0
   753                                  		sub	ax, [ReservSectors]
   754                                  
   755                                  		sbb	dx, 0		; DX:AX	= Total	available sectors
   756                                  		
   757                                  		push	ax
   758                                  		push	dx
   759                                  		
   760                                  		mov	bx, [FATSectorsL]
   761                                  		
   762                                  		;mov	cx, [FATSectorsH]
   763                                  		;push	ax
   764                                  		;push	dx
   765                                  		;;mov	al, [NumFats]
   766                                  		;;xor	ah, ah
   767                                  		;mov	ax, [NumFats]

   778                                  	
   779                                  		pop	dx
   780                                  		pop	ax
   781                                  
   782                                  		sub	ax, bx
   783                                  		sbb	dx, cx		; DX:AX = Total sectors - FAT sectors
   784                                  		
   785                                  		mov	bx, [RootEntCnt] ; Root directory entry count
   786                                  		mov	cl, 4
   787                                  		shr	bx, cl		; BX = Total directory sectors
   788                                  		sub	ax, bx
   789                                  		sbb	dx, 0		; DX:AX	= Sectors in data area
   790                                  %endif
   791                                  		; 14/09/2023
   792 00000138 8B16[3900]              		mov	dx, [FirstSectorL]
   793 0000013C 8B0E[3B00]              		mov	cx, [FirstSectorH]

   836                                  		;cmp	ax, 4086	; 4096-10
   837 00000179 7205                    		jb	short ReadInFirstCluster ; 12 bit FAT
   838 0000017B C606[3E00]04            		mov	byte [FatType], 4 ; set FAT type to FAT16
   839                                  
   840                                  ; ReadInFirstCluster
   841                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   842                                  ;
   843                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   844                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   845                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   846                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   847                                  ;
   848                                  ; INPUT:
   849                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   850                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   851                                  ;
   852                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   853                                  ;   ClusterSize
   854                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   855                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   856                                  ;
   857                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   858                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   859                                  ;
   860                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   861                                  ; logic:
   862                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   863                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   864                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   865                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   866                                  ;	read in so far.
   867                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   868                                  
   869                                  ; 09/12/2022
   870                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   871                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   872                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   873                                  	
   874                                  ReadInFirstCluster:
   875                                  		; 14/09/2023
   876 00000180 8B16[3700]              		mov	dx, [FirstCluster+2]
   877 00000184 A1[3500]                		mov	ax, [FirstCluster]
   878                                  					; IBMBIO.COM First Cluster
   879                                  					; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   880                                  					; IBMBIO.COM first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   881                                  					; high word of cluster is at 514h
   882                                  		; 14/10/2023 (!*!)
   883                                  		;; a cluster number start from 2
   884                                  		;; convert it to (correct) cluster index number
   885                                  		;sub	ax, 2
   886                                  		;sbb	dx, 0
   887                                  		;	; DX:AX = zero based cluster number (cluster index)
   888                                  
   889 00000187 8916[1500]              		mov	[CurrentClusterH], dx
   890 0000018B A3[1300]                		mov	[CurrentClusterL], ax ; Initialize to this cluster
   891                                  
   892                                  		; 24/12/2022
   893                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - MSLOAD:0255h) ; 04/10/2023 ('mov ax,3')
   894                                  		;;mov	ax, IbmLoadSize
   895                                  		;mov	ax, 3		; Load the 3rd and other IO.SYS	sectors
   896                                  		; 04/10/2023  ; **	 	
   897                                  		; (Windows ME IO.SYS - MSLOAD:01E4h)
   898 0000018E B80400                  		mov	ax, 4 ; **	; Load the 4rd and other IO.SYS	sectors	
   899                                  
   900                                  		; 14/09/2023
   901                                  		;div	byte [SecPerCluster]
   902 00000191 F6F1                    		div	cl ; *#*
   903                                  					; AL = total cluster read in
   904                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster
   905                                  		
   906                                  		; (Note: PCDOS 7.1 bs loads 1st 4 sectors of IBMBIO.COM)
   907                                  		; If cluster size > 3, al = 0, ah <> 0
   908                                  		; If cluster size = 2, al = 1, ah = 1
   909                                  		; If cluster size = 1, al = 3, ah = 0
   910                                  		; If ah = 0, nothing remaining in last cluster
   911                                  
   912                                  		; 14/10/2023
   913 00000193 BE7000                  		mov	si, 70h ; ++*
   914 00000196 8EC6                    		mov	es, si	; ++	; ES = BIOSDATA (IO.SYS DATA) segment
   915                                  
   916                                  		; 14/09/2023
   917                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   918                                  		; 10/12/2022
   919 00000198 20E4                    		and	ah, ah
   920                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   921 0000019A 742F                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster
   922                                  			; 04/10/2023 ; **
   923                                  			; If AH=0
   924                                  			;    and if CL=1, AL=4
   925                                  			;    and if CL=2, AL=2 (?)
   926                                  			;    and if CL=4, AL=1
   927                                  			; If AH>0
   928                                  			;    AL=0 and AH=4

   934                                  					; already read in

   936                                  ; 24/12/2022

   938                                  		mov	cx, [FirstSectorL]	; Put starting sector of disk data
   939                                  		mov	[StartSecL], cx	; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   940                                  		mov	cx, [FirstSectorH]
   941                                  		mov	[StartSecH], cx
   942                                  		mul	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   943                                  		add	[StartSecL], ax	; Add number of sectors already loaded
   944                                  		adc	word [StartSecH], 0	; to start sector

   949                                  		mov	dx, [CurrentClusterH]	; IBMBIO.COM 1st cluster (index)
   950                                  		mov	ax, [CurrentClusterL]	; (zero based cluster number)
   951                                  
   952                                  		xor	bx, bx
   953                                  		mov	bl, [SecPerCluster]
   954                                  		mul	bx		; DX:AX = logical start sector
   955                                  		add	[StartSecL], ax
   956                                  		adc	[StartSecH], dx
   957                                  					; abs start sector for next read of
   958                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster
   959                                  		pop	ax	; (*) number of clusters already loaded
   960                                  				; (0 or 1)

   962                                  				; will be loaded again! -PCDOS 7.1-)
   963                                  		push	ax
   964                                  		mul	word [ClusterSize]
   965                                  		;mov	di, BiosOffset
   966                                  		mov	di, 700h	; IBMBIO.COM (IO.SYS) loading addr (segment = 0)
   967                                  		add	di, ax
   968                                  		xor	ax, ax
   969                                  		mov	es, ax		; ES = segment 0
   970                                  		mov	al, [SecPerCluster] 
   971                                  					; Read in the entire last cluster
   972                                  		mov	[SectorCount], ax
   973                                  		call	ReadSectors

   975                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   976                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...

   979                                  		adc	[CurrentClusterH], 0
   980                                  		dec	ax		; CurrentCluster = Last	cluster	read
   981                                  					; AX = number of clusters loaded
   982                                  %endif

   986 0000019E 28E0                    		sub	al, ah ; ** (remain sectors to read in the cluster)
   987 000001A0 A2[1100]                		mov	[SectorCount], al ; ** (spc-4)

  1114                                  SetNextClusterNum:

  1118 000001CC 0106[1300]              		add	[CurrentClusterL], ax  ; ah = 0

  1121 000001D5 40                      		inc	ax 
  1122                                  		;dec	ax

  1124                                  		
  1125                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
  1126                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1127                                  ;
  1128                                  ; NOTES:
  1129                                  ;
  1130                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
  1131                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
  1132                                  ;
  1133                                  ; INPUT:
  1134                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
  1135                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
  1136                                  ;
  1137                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1138                                  ;	ES = 70h
  1139                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
  1140                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
  1141                                  ;
  1142                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
  1143                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
  1144                                  ;
  1145                                  ; calls:     none
  1146                                  ;
  1147                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1148                                  ;
  1149                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
  1150                                  ;
  1151                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
  1152                                  ;
  1153                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
  1154                                  ;
  1155                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1156                                  
  1157                                  SaveLoadedBios:
  1158                                  		; 14/10/2023
  1159                                  		;push	ds
  1160                                  		
  1161                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1162                                  		; ds = cs
  1163                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
  1164 000001D6 F726[0500]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
  1165                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
  1166                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
  1167                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
  1168                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
  1169                                  		; 14/10/2023
  1170                                  		; ax = [clusterSize] * (loaded cluster count)
  1171                                  SaveLoadedBios2:
  1172                                  		; 14/10/2023
  1173 000001DA 1E                      		push	ds
  1174                                  		
  1175                                  		; 14/10/2023
  1176                                  		;sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
  1177 000001DB BE[7004]                		mov	si, EndOfLoader
  1178 000001DE 29F0                    		sub	ax, si

  1180

  1192                                  		
  1193                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di

  1198                                  
  1199                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1200

  1202                                  
  1203                                  ; GetContigClusters
  1204                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1205                                  ;
  1206                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
  1207                                  ;
  1208                                  ;
  1209                                  ; INPUT:
  1210                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
  1211                                  ;   CS:
  1212                                  ;
  1213                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1214                                  ;
  1215                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
  1216                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1217                                  ;
  1218                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
  1219                                  ;
  1220                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
  1221                                  ;
  1222                                  ;Call check_for_eof
  1223                                  ;
  1224                                  ;if (nc returned)
  1225                                  ;
  1226                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
  1227                                  ;
  1228                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
  1229                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
  1230                                  ;
  1231                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
  1232                                  ;
  1233                                  ;	 if (nc returned)
  1234                                  ;
  1235                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1236                                  
  1237                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1238                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1239                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
  1240                                  
  1241                                  GetContigClusters:
  1242                                  
  1243                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1244                                  %if 0	
  1245                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1246                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1247                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1248                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1249                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1250                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1251                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1252                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1253                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1254                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1255                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1256                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1257                                  		dec	ax
  1258                                  		dec	ax
  1259                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1260                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1261                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1262                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1263                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1264                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1265                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1266                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1267                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1268                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1269                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1270                                  		mov	es, ax
  1271                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1272                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1273                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1274                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1275                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1276                                  
  1277                                  %endif
  1278                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1279                                  		; ds = cs

  1281 000001EB A1[1900]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster

  1346                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1347                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1348                                  ;
  1349                                  ; NOTES:
  1350                                  ;
  1351                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1352                                  ;
  1353                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1354                                  ;
  1355                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1356                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1357                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1358                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1359                                  ;
  1360                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1361                                  ;
  1362                                  ;   required by msinit
  1363                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1364                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1365                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1366                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1367                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1368                                  ;
  1369                                  ; calls:     none
  1370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1371                                  ;
  1372                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1373                                  ;
  1374                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1375                                  
  1376                                  GoToBioInit:
  1377                                  	
  1378                                  ; 05/10/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 IBMBIO.COM (PCDOS 7.1)
  1379                                  %if 0
  1380                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1381                                  		; ds = cs	
  1382                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1383                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1384                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1385                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1386                                  
  1387                                  		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1388                                  		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1389                                  		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1390                                  		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1391                                  %endif
  1392

  1471                                  
  1472                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1473                                  
  1474                                  ; ReadSectors
  1475                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1476                                  ; notES:
  1477                                  ;
  1478                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1479                                  ;
  1480                                  ;
  1481                                  ; INPUT:
  1482                                  ;
  1483                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1484                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1485                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1486                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1487                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1488                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1489                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1490                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1491                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1492                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1493                                  ;
  1494                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1495                                  ;
  1496                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1498                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1499                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1500                                  ;
  1501                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1502                                  ;
  1503                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1504                                  ;
  1505                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1506                                  ;
  1507                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1508                                  ;
  1509                                  ; do the read
  1510                                  ;
  1511                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1512                                  ;
  1513                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1514                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1515                                  ;
  1516                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1517                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1518                                  
  1519                                  ; 05/10/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 IBMBIO.COM (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
  1520                                  
  1521                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1522                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1523                                  ReadSectors:

  1840                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)

  1872                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1873                                  
  1874                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1876                                  ;
  1877                                  ; NOTES:
  1878                                  ;
  1879                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1880                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1881                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1882                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1883                                  ;
  1884                                  ; INPUT:
  1885                                  ;
  1886                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1887                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1888                                  ;
  1889                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1890                                  ;
  1891                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1892                                  ;
  1893                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1894                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1895                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1896                                  ;
  1897                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1898                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1899                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1900                                  ;     else
  1901                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1902                                  ;
  1903                                  ; else
  1904                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1905                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1906                                  ;     else
  1907                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 3
  1908                                  ;
  1909                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1910                                  ;
  1911                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1912                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1913                                  ;
  1914                                  ;	 else
  1915                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1916                                  ;	}
  1917                                  ;    }
  1918                                  ;
  1919                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1920                                  
  1921                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1922                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1923                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1924                                  
  1925                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1926                                  		; 05/10/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 IBMBIO.COM (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
  1927                                  
  1928 00000347 06                      		push	es
  1929                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1930                                  		; ds = cs
  1931                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1932 00000348 A1[4500]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1933 0000034B 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1934                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1935                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1936                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1937                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1938                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1939                                  		; ds = cs
  1940 0000034D C606[4000]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1941                                  		;;;
  1942                                  		;mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1943                                  		; 05/10/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1)
  1944 00000352 A1[1300]                		mov	ax, [CurrentClusterL] ; Get last cluster
  1945                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1946                                  		;mov	di, [CurrentClusterH]
  1947                                  chk_fat32_type:
  1948                                  		; 05/10/2023
  1949 00000355 803E[3E00]0B            		cmp	byte [FatType], 0Bh  ; FAT32 (CHS) fs ?
  1950 0000035A 7520                    		jne	short chk_fat_type   ; no
  1951                                  Got32bit:
  1952 0000035C 8B3E[1500]              		mov	di, [CurrentClusterH]
  1953 00000360 01C0                    		add	ax, ax
  1954 00000362 11FF                    		adc	di, di
  1955 00000364 01C0                    		add	ax, ax
  1956 00000366 11FF                    		adc	di, di          ; Get the FAT offset (di:si)
  1957 00000368 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1958 0000036A E86700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1959 0000036D 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1960 00000370 268B7F02                		mov	di, [es:bx+2]
  1961                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1962                                  		;and	di, 0FFFh ; 28 bit cluster number
  1963 00000374 81FFFF0F                		cmp	di, 0FFFh       ; FAT32 cluster numbers are 28 bit numbers
  1964                                  					; (higher 4 bits are -must be- zero)
  1965                                  		;jne	short GotFAT32ClusterDone
  1966 00000378 751E                    		jne	short GotClusterDoneJ
  1967                                  		; 06/10/2023

  1969                                  ;GotFAT32ClusterDone:
  1970                                  		;jmp	short GotClusterDoneJ
  1971                                  		; 09/12/2023
  1972                                  		;mov	dx, 0FFF8h
  1973                                  		;jmp	short isitlastcluster
  1974 0000037A EB17                    		jmp	short isitlastcluster_16_32
  1975                                  		;;;
  1976                                  chk_fat_type:
  1977                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1978 0000037C 29FF                    		sub	di, di ; 0 ; hw of the cluster number must be 0
  1979                                  				   ; (if it is not FAT32 cluster) 
  1980                                  		; 05/10/2023
  1981 0000037E 803E[3E00]01            		cmp	byte [FatType], 1
  1982                                  		;cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1983                                  		;;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1984                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1985                                  		;jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022

  1987 00000383 741C                    		je	short Got12Bit

  1995                                  		;xor	dx, dx

  2001                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  2002 00000385 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  2003 00000387 11FF                    		adc	di, di	; di = 0 ; 06/10/2023	
  2004

  2014

  2025                                  		;cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  2026                                  GotClusterDoneJ:	; 05/10/2023
  2027 00000398 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  2028                                  NotLastCluster:	
  2029                                  		; 24/12/2022
  2030                                  		; ds = cs
  2031                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  2032                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  2033 0000039A C606[4000]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  2034                                  GotClusterDone:
  2035 0000039F 07                      		pop	es

  2037                                  EndRead:
