  8087                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8088                                  
  8089                                  ; setdrvparms sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the system based on
  8090                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  8091                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same
  8092                                  ; as the bpb on the drive.
  8093                                  ;
  8094                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
  8095                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
  8096                                  
  8097                                  setdrvparms:
  8098 00001EC1 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  8099                                  		; 18/10/2022
  8100 00001EC3 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds in list
  8101                                  _next_bds:

  8103 00001EC8 57                      		push	di

  8105 00001ECD 80FB05                  		cmp	bl, 5		; ffHardFile
  8106 00001ED0 753E                    		jnz	short nothardff
  8107 00001ED2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8108 00001ED4 268B450E                		mov	ax, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
  8109 00001ED8 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8110 00001EDA 7508                    		jnz	short get_ccyl
  8111 00001EDC 268B551D                		mov	dx, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  8112 00001EE0 268B451B                		mov	ax, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  8113                                  
  8114                                  get_ccyl:				
  8115 00001EE4 52                      		push	dx

  8118 00001EEA 26F76513                		mul	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
  8119                                  					; assume sectors per cyl. < 64k.
  8120 00001EEE 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx has # sectors per cylinder
  8121 00001EF0 58                      		pop	ax

  8123 00001EF2 50                      		push	ax

  8128 00001EFD 58                      		pop	ax

  8146                                  
  8147                                  ; if fake floppy drive variable is set then we don't have to handle this bds.
  8148                                  ; we can just go and deal with the next bds at label go_to_next_bds.
  8149                                  
  8150                                  		; 10/12/2022
  8151                                  		; ds = cs
  8152                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  8153 00001F12 803E[5D15]01            		cmp	byte [fakefloppydrv], 1
  8154                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:fakefloppydrv], 1
  8155 00001F17 7454                    		jz	short go_to_next_bds
  8156 00001F19 80FB07                  		cmp	bl, 7		; ffother
  8157                                  					; special case "other" type of medium
  8158 00001F1C 753D                    		jnz	short not_process_other
  8159                                  process_other:
  8160 00001F1E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8161 00001F20 8B4525                  		mov	ax, [di+25h]	; [di+BDS.cylinders]
  8162 00001F23 F76536                  		mul	word [di+36h]	; [di+BDS.rheads]
  8163 00001F26 F76534                  		mul	word [di+34h]	; [di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
  8164 00001F29 89452F                  		mov	[di+2Fh], ax	; [di+BDS.rtotalsecs16]
  8165                                  					; have the total number of sectors
  8166 00001F2C 48                      		dec	ax
  8167 00001F2D B201                    		mov	dl, 1
  8168                                  _again:					
  8169 00001F2F 3DF60F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF6h	; 4096-10
  8170 00001F32 7206                    		jb	short _@@
  8171 00001F34 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8172 00001F36 D0E2                    		shl	dl, 1
  8173 00001F38 EBF5                    		jmp	short _again
  8174                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8175                                  
  8176                                  _@@:					
  8177 00001F3A 80FA01                  		cmp	dl, 1		; is it	a small	disk ?
  8178 00001F3D 7405                    		jz	short __@@	; yes, 224 root	entries	is enuf
  8179 00001F3F C7452DF000              		mov	word [di+2Dh], 240 ; [di+BDS.rdirentries]
  8180                                  __@@:					
  8181 00001F44 885529                  		mov	[di+29h], dl	; [di+BDS.rsecperclus]
  8182                                  
  8183                                  ; logic to get the sectors/fat area.
  8184                                  ; fat entry is assumed to be 1.5 bytes!!!
  8185                                  
  8186                                  		; 10/12/2022
  8187                                  		; ds = cs
  8188                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  8189 00001F47 F726[BD1E]              		mul	word [word3]
  8190 00001F4B F736[BB1E]              		div	word [word2]
  8191 00001F4F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8192 00001F51 F736[BF1E]              		div	word [word512]
  8193                                  		;
  8194                                  		; 10/12/2022
  8195                                  		;mul	word [cs:word3]	; * 3 ; mul word [cs:word3]
  8196                                  		;div	word [cs:word2]	; / 2 ; div word [cs:word2]
  8197                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  8198                                  		;div	word [cs:word512] ; / 512 ; div word [cs:word512]
  8199                                  		;
  8200 00001F55 40                      		inc	ax		; + 1
  8201                                  no_round_up:
  8202 00001F56 894532                  		mov	[di+32h], ax	; [di+BDS.rfatsecs]
  8203 00001F59 EB12                    		jmp	short go_to_next_bds
  8204                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8205                                  
  8206                                  not_process_other:			
  8207 00001F5B D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1		; bx is	word index into	table of bpbs
  8208                                  		;mov	si, bpbtable
  8209                                  		;mov	si, [bpbtable+bx] ; 15/10/2022
  8210                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8211                                  		;mov	si, BPBTABLE
  8212                                  		;mov	si, [bx+si]	; get address of bpb
  8213                                  		; 10/12/2022
  8214                                  		;mov	si, [BPBTABLE+bx]
  8215                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8216                                  		;mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx] ; wrong ! 14/08/2023
  8217                                  		; 14/08/2023
  8218                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ (SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG<<4)
  8219                                  							; correct offset
  8220 00001F5D 8BB7[FC86]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  8221                                  		
  8222                                  		; 28/08/2023
  8223 00001F61 81C6103D                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  8224                                  set_recbpb:					
  8225 00001F65 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  8226                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  8227 00001F68 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  8228 00001F6B F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  8229                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  8230 00001F6D 5F                      		pop	di
  8231 00001F6E 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  8232 00001F6F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  8233 00001F72 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  8234 00001F75 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  8235 00001F77 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  8236                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8237                                  
  8238                                  		; 18/12/2022
  8239                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  8240                                  		;retn
  8241

  8243

  8245                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8246                                  
  8247                                  ; al = device number
  8248                                  
  8249                                  print_init:	
  8250 00001F7A 98                      		cbw
  8251 00001F7B 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8252 00001F7D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8253 00001F7F CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  8254                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8255                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8256                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  8257 00001F81 C3                      		retn

  8267                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)

  8272                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  8273                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  8274                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  8275                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  8276 00001F8A C3                      		retn
