  9404                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9405                                  
  9406                                  ;************************************************************************
  9407                                  ;*									*
  9408                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  9409                                  ;*									*
  9410                                  ;************************************************************************
  9411                                  
  9412                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  9413                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  9414 0000015F E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  9415                                  con_loop:				
  9416 00000161 E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  9417 00000164 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  9418 00000165 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  9419                                  con_exit:				
  9420 00000167 F8                      		clc
  9421 00000168 C3                      		retn
  9422                                  
  9423                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9424                                  
  9425                                  ;************************************************************************
  9426                                  ;*									*
  9427                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  9428                                  ;*									*
  9429                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  9430                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  9431                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  9432                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  9433                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  9434                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  9435                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  9436                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  9437                                  ;*									*
  9438                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  9439                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  9440                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9441                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  9442                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9443                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  9444                                  ;*									*
  9445                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  9446                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  9447                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  9448                                  ;*									*
  9449                                  ;************************************************************************
  9450                                  
  9451                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9452                                  chrin:		
  9453 00000169 8A26[8504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  9454 0000016D 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9455 0000016F 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  9456 00000173 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9457 00000175 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  9458 00000177 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9459 00000179 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9460 0000017B 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  9461 0000017D 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9462 00000180 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  9463 00000182 B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  9464 00000184 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  9465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9466                                  
  9467                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  9468                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  9469                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  9470                                  ;	 goto keyret
  9471                                  ;      else
  9472                                  ;	 set al to zero
  9473                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  9474                                  ;      endif
  9475                                  ;    endif
  9476                                  ;  endif
  9477                                  
  9478                                  alt_ext_chk:
  9479 00000186 803E[8504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  9480 0000018B 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  9481 0000018D 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  9482 0000018F 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  9483 00000191 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  9484 00000193 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  9485 00000195 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9486 00000197 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  9487                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9488                                  
  9489                                  not_ext:				
  9490 00000199 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  9491 0000019B 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  9492                                  alt_save:				
  9493 0000019D 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  9494                                  keyret:					
  9495 000001A1 C3                      		retn
  9496                                  
  9497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9498                                  
  9499                                  ;************************************************************************
  9500                                  ;*									*
  9501                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  9502                                  ;*									*
  9503                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  9504                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  9505                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  9506                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  9507                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  9508                                  ;*									*
  9509                                  ;************************************************************************
  9510                                  
  9511                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9512                                  con_rdnd:				
  9513 000001A2 A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  9514 000001A5 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9515 000001A7 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9516 000001A9 8A26[8604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  9517 000001AD CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9518 000001AF 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  9519 000001B1 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  9520 000001B6 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9521 000001B8 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9522                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9523 000001BC 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  9524                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  9525 000001C1 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9526 000001C3 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  9527 000001C6 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  9528 000001C8 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  9529                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  9530                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  9531                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  9532                                  z_bus_exit:				
  9533 000001CA F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  9534 000001CB B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  9535 000001CD C3                      		retn
  9536                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9537                                  
  9538                                  gotchr:					
  9539 000001CE 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9540 000001D0 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  9541 000001D2 8A26[8504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  9542 000001D6 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9543 000001D8 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  9544                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9545                                  
  9546                                  notbrk:					
  9547 000001DA 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9548 000001DD 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  9549 000001DF B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  9550 000001E1 EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  9551                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9552                                  
  9553                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  9554 000001E3 803E[8504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  9555 000001E8 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  9556 000001EA 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  9557 000001EC 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9558 000001EE 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  9559 000001F1 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  9560 000001F3 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  9561                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  9562                                  rdexit:					
  9563 000001F5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9564 000001F9 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  9565                                  					; return keyboard character here
  9566                                  bc_exvec:				
  9567 000001FD F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  9568                                  					; indicate normal termination
  9569 000001FE C3                      		retn
  9570                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9571                                  
  9572                                  ;************************************************************************
  9573                                  ;*									*
  9574                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  9575                                  ;*									*
  9576                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  9577                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  9578                                  ;*									*
  9579                                  ;************************************************************************
  9580                                  
  9581                                  con_writ:

  9583 000001FF E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022

  9590                                  					; AL = character to display

  9598                                  ;************************************************************************
  9599                                  ;*									*
  9600                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*

  9606                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  9607 00000210 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9608 00000212 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  9609                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  9610                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  9611                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  9612 00000214 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  9613 00000216 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9614 00000218 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  9615                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  9616 0000021A EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop

  9622                                  ;************************************************************************
  9623                                  ;*									*
  9624                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  9625                                  ;*									*
  9626                                  ;************************************************************************
  9627                                  
  9628                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  9629                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  9630                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  9631                                  
  9632                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  9633                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  9634                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  9635                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  9636                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  9637                                  ;
  9638                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  9639                                  
  9640                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9641                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  9642                                  
  9643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9644                                  
  9645                                  ;************************************************************************
  9646                                  ;*									*
  9647                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  9648                                  ;*									*
  9649                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  9650                                  ;*									*
  9651                                  ;************************************************************************
  9652                                  
  9653                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  9654 0000021C E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  9655                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  9656                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9657                                  prn_done:
  9658 0000021F F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  9659 00000220 C3                      		retn
  9660                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9661                                  
  9662                                  ;************************************************************************
  9663                                  ;*									*
  9664                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  9665                                  ;*									*
  9666                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  9667                                  ;*									*
  9668                                  ;************************************************************************
  9669                                  
  9670                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  9671                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  9672 00000221 E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  9673                                  prn_loop:				
  9674 00000223 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  9675                                  prn_out:				
  9676 00000226 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9677 00000229 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  9678 0000022B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  9679 0000022E 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9680 00000230 E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  9681 00000233 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  9682 00000235 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  9683 00000238 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  9684 0000023A B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  9685 0000023C C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  9686 00000241 EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  9687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9688

  9691 00000246 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  9692                                  TestPrnError:

  9694 00000249 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out

  9702                                  ;prn_done:				
  9703                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9704                                  prn_done2:
  9705                                  		;clc
  9706                                  		; cf=0
  9707 00000251 C3                      		retn
  9708                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9709                                  
  9710                                  ;************************************************************************
  9711                                  ;*									*
  9712                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  9713                                  ;*									*
  9714                                  ;************************************************************************
  9715                                  
  9716                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  9717 00000252 E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  9718 00000255 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  9719 00000257 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  9720                                  		;jnz	short prn_done

  9724                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9725                                  
  9726                                  ;************************************************************************
  9727                                  ;*									*
  9728                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  9729                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  9730                                  ;*									*
  9731                                  ;************************************************************************
  9732                                  
  9733                                  prnstat:				
  9734 0000025F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  9735                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  9736                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  9737                                  					; Return: AH = status
  9738                                  
  9739                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9740                                  
  9741                                  ;************************************************************************
  9742                                  ;*									*
  9743                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  9744                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  9745                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  9746                                  ;*									*
  9747                                  ;************************************************************************
  9748                                  
  9749                                  prnop:	
  9750 00000261 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  9751 00000265 CD17                    		int	17h		
  9752                                  
  9753                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  9754                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  9755                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  9756                                  
  9757 00000267 50                      		push	ax
  9758 00000268 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  9759 0000026B 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  9760 0000026E 58                      		pop	ax
  9761 0000026F 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  9762 00000271 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  9763 00000274 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  9764                                  
  9765                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  9766                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  9767                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  9768                                  
  9769                                  NextTest:				
  9770 00000277 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  9771                                  					; i/o error?
  9772 0000027A 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  9773                                  
  9774                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  9775                                  
  9776 0000027C B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  9777                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  9778 0000027E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  9779 00000281 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  9780 00000283 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  9781                                  ret1:					
  9782 00000285 C3                      		retn
  9783                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9784                                  
  9785                                  checknotready:				
  9786 00000286 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  9787 00000288 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  9788 0000028B C3                      		retn
  9789                                  
  9790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9791                                  
  9792                                  ;************************************************************************
  9793                                  ;*									*
  9794                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  9795                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  9796                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  9797                                  ;*									*
  9798                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  9799                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  9800                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  9801                                  ;*									*
  9802                                  ;************************************************************************
  9803                                  
  9804                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9805                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  9806 0000028C 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  9807                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  9808 0000028E 51                      		push	cx
  9809 0000028F 53                      		push	bx
  9810 00000290 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9811 00000292 8A1E[8704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9812 00000296 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9813                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  9814 00000298 8B8F[8804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9815 0000029C 5B                      		pop	bx
  9816                                  prn_getstat:				
  9817 0000029D E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9818 000002A0 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  9819 000002A2 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  9820 000002A5 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  9821 000002A7 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  9822 000002A8 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  9823 000002AA 26                      		es
  9824 000002AB AC                      		lodsb
  9825                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  9826                                  					; lodsb
  9827 000002AC 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9828 000002AE E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  9829 000002B1 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  9830 000002B3 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  9831                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9832                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  9833                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  9834 000002B5 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  9835

  9837                                  
  9838                                  prn_bperr:

  9840                                  prn_berr:				
  9841 000002B7 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  9846                                  ;************************************************************************
  9847                                  ;*									*
  9848                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  9849                                  ;*									*
  9850                                  ;************************************************************************
  9851                                  
  9852                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  9853                                  ; 11/01/2019
  9854

  9857                                  ;********************************;*
  9858                                  
  9859                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS

  9861                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h

  9865                                  ;;endstruc

  9871                                  		; 19/10/2022

  9875                                  					; ioc_pc

  9884 000002CC 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  9885 000002D0 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9886                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  9887 000002D2 8A1E[8704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9888 000002D6 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9889                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  9890 000002D8 8B8F[8804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9891 000002DC 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  9892 000002DE 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  9893 000002E0 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  9894 000002E2 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr

  9896                                  prngetcount:

  9898 000002E7 898F[8804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  9899 000002EB 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  9900                                  					; return current retry count
  9901                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9902                                  		; cf=0
  9903                                  		;clc
  9904 000002EE C3                      		retn

  9936                                  
  9937                                  ;************************************************************************
  9938                                  ;*									*
  9939                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9940                                  ;*									*
  9941                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9942                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9943                                  ;*									*
  9944                                  ;************************************************************************
  9945                                  
  9946                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9947                                  
  9948                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9949                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9950                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9951                                  
  9952                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9953                                  
  9954                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9955                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9956                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9957                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9958                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9959                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9960                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9961                                  
  9962                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9963                                  
  9964                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9965                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9966                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9967                                  
  9968                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9969                                  
  9970                                  ;************************************************************************
  9971                                  ;*									*
  9972                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9973                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9974                                  ;*									*
  9975                                  ;************************************************************************
  9976                                  
  9977                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9978                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9979 0000030A E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9980 0000030C E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9981 0000030F 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9982 00000311 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9983 00000313 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9984 00000315 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9985                                  aux1:					
  9986 00000317 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9987                                  					; won't return if error
  9988                                  aux2:					
  9989 0000031A AA                      		stosb
  9990 0000031B E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9991                                  exvec2:					
  9992 0000031D F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9993                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9994 0000031E C3                      		retn

  9996                                  
  9997                                  ;************************************************************************
  9998                                  ;*									*
  9999                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
 10000                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
 10001                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
 10002                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
 10003                                  ;*									*
 10004                                  ;************************************************************************
 10005                                  
 10006                                  auxin:					
 10007 0000031F B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
 10008 00000321 E83A00                  		call	auxop
 10009 00000324 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
 10010                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
 10011                                  		;retn
 10012                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
 10013 00000327 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
 10014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10015                                  
 10016                                  arbad:					
 10017 00000329 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
 10018                                  		;xor	al, al
 10019                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
 10020                                  		; 11/08/2023
 10021 0000032A B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
 10022 0000032C E9ACFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 10023                                  
 10024                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10025                                  
 10026                                  ;************************************************************************
 10027                                  ;*									*
 10028                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
 10029                                  ;*									*
 10030                                  ;************************************************************************
 10031                                  
 10032                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
 10033 0000032F E85200                  		call	getbx
 10034 00000332 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
 10035 00000334 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
 10036 00000336 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
 10037 00000338 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
 10038 0000033B F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
 10039 0000033E 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 10040 00000340 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
 10041 00000342 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 10042 00000344 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
 10043 00000347 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
 10044                                  auxdrx:					
 10045 00000349 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status

 10047

 10051                                  
 10052                                  ;************************************************************************

 10055                                  ;*									*

 10057                                  
 10058                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

 10060 00000352 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
 10061 00000354 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 10062 00000356 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
 10063 00000359 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)

 10065                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
 10066                                  		;clc
 10067 0000035B C3                      		retn

 10069                                  
 10070                                  ;************************************************************************
 10071                                  ;*									*
 10072                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
 10073                                  ;*									*
 10074                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
 10075                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 10076                                  ;*									*
 10077                                  ;************************************************************************
 10078                                  
 10079                                  auxstat:				
 10080 0000035C B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
 10081                                  
 10082                                  		; fall into auxop
 10083                                  
 10084                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10085                                  
 10086                                  ;************************************************************************
 10087                                  ;*									*
 10088                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
 10089                                  ;*									*
 10090                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
 10091                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
 10092                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 10093                                  ;*									*
 10094                                  ;************************************************************************
 10095                                  
 10096                                  auxop:		; proc near		
 10097 0000035E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
 10098                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
 10099                                  					; get port number
 10100 00000362 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
 10101                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
 10102                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
 10103 00000364 C3                      		retn
 10104                                  
 10105                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10106                                  
 10107                                  ;************************************************************************
 10108                                  ;*									*
 10109                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
 10110                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
 10111                                  ;*									*
 10112                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
 10113                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
 10114                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
 10115                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
 10116                                  ;*									*
 10117                                  ;************************************************************************
 10118                                  
 10119                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
 10120 00000365 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
 10121 00000368 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
 10122                                  					; zero out buffer
 10123                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
 10124                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10125                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
 10126 0000036B C3                      		retn
 10127                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10128                                  
 10129                                  ;************************************************************************
 10130                                  ;*									*
 10131                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
 10132                                  ;*									*
 10133                                  ;************************************************************************
 10134                                  
 10135                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
 10136                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
 10137 0000036C E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
 10138                                  aux_loop:				
 10139 0000036E 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
 10140                                  					; move di pointer to next character
 10141 00000371 47                      		inc	di
 10142 00000372 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
 10143 00000374 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
 10144 00000377 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
 10145 0000037A 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
 10146 0000037C B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
 10147 0000037E E95AFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
 10148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10149                                  
 10150                                  awok:					
 10151 00000381 E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
 10152                                  					; still	more character to print
 10153                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
 10154                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10155                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
 10156 00000383 C3                      		retn
 10157                                  
 10158                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10159                                  
 10160                                  ;************************************************************************
 10161                                  ;*									*
 10162                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
 10163                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
 10164                                  ;*									*
 10165                                  ;************************************************************************
 10166                                  
 10167                                  getbx:	
 10168 00000384 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
 10169                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
 10170                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
 10171 00000388 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
 10172                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10173                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
 10174 0000038C C3                      		retn
 10175

 10177                                  
 10178                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10179                                  
 10180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
 10181                                  ;								:
 10182                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
 10183                                  ;								:
 10184                                  ;								:
 10185                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
 10186                                  ;								:
 10187                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
 10188                                  ;								:
 10189                                  ;	routine 		function			:
 10190                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
 10191                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
 10192                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
 10193                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
 10194                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
 10195                                  ;								:
 10196                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
 10197                                  ;								:
 10198                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
 10199                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
 10200                                  ;								:
 10201                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
 10202                                  
 10203                                  ; convert time to ticks
 10204                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
 10205                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
 10206                                  
 10207                                  ;19/07/2019
 10208                                  ;09/03/2019
 10209                                  
 10210                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
 10211                                  
 10212                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
 10213                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
 10214                                  
 10215 0000038D B03C                    		mov	al, 60
 10216 0000038F F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
 10217 00000391 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
 10218 00000393 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
 10219 00000395 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
 10220 00000398 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
 10221 0000039A F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
 10222 0000039C 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 10223 0000039E B064                    		mov	al, 100
 10224 000003A0 F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
 10225 000003A2 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
 10226 000003A4 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
 10227 000003A7 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
 10228 000003A9 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
 10229 000003AB 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
 10230                                  
 10231                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
 10232                                  
 10233 000003AE 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
 10234 000003AF 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
 10235 000003B0 BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
 10236 000003B3 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
 10237 000003B5 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
 10238 000003B7 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
 10239 000003B8 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
 10240 000003BA 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
 10241 000003BC 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
 10242 000003BF 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
 10243 000003C0 BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
 10244 000003C3 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
 10245 000003C5 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 10246 000003C7 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
 10247 000003C9 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
 10248 000003CB 98                      		cbw
 10249 000003CC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
 10250 000003CD F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
 10251 000003CF 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
 10252 000003D1 CB                      		retf			; far return
 10253                                  
 10254                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10255                                  
 10256                                  ; 17/10/2022
 10257                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10258                                  
 10259                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
 10260                                  ;
 10261                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
 10262                                  ;
 10263                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
 10264                                  ;
 10265                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
 10266                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
 10267                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
 10268                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
 10269                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
 10270                                  ;
 10271                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
 10272                                  ;
 10273                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
 10274                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
 10275                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
 10276                                  ;
 10277                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
 10278                                  
 10279                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 10280                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
 10281                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
 10282 000003D2 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
 10283 000003D5 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
 10284                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
 10285 000003D6 803E[9304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
 10286                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0

 10290                                  					; convert to bcd

 10298                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd

 10311                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
 10312                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time

 10363                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
 10364                                  
 10365                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
 10366                                  ;
 10367                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
 10368                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
 10369                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
 10370                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
 10371                                  
 10372                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
 10373                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
 10374 00000427 FF36[9004]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
 10375 0000042B 813E[9004]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
 10376                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
 10377 00000431 7308                    		jnb	short century20
 10378                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
 10379                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
 10380                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10381 00000433 C706[9404]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
 10382 00000439 EB0C                    		jmp	short years
 10383                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10384                                  		
 10385                                  century20:				
 10386                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 20
 10387                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 0
 10388                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10389 0000043B C706[9404]1400          		mov	word [base_century], 20
 10390 00000441 812E[9004]891C          		sub	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
 10391                                  					; adjust daycnt
 10392                                  years:					
 10393 00000447 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10394 00000449 A1[9004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
 10395 0000044C BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
 10396                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
 10397 0000044F F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
 10398 00000451 8916[9004]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
 10399 00000455 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
 10400 00000457 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
 10401 00000459 0006[9504]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
 10402 0000045D FF06[9004]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
 10403                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10404 00000461 BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
 10405 00000464 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
 10406                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
 10407 00000467 391E[9004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
 10408 0000046B 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
 10409 0000046D FE06[9504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
 10410                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
 10411 00000471 291E[9004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
 10412                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
 10413                                  regularyear:	
 10414                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10415 00000475 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365			
 10416                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
 10417 00000476 391E[9004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
 10418 0000047A 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
 10419 0000047C FE06[9504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
 10420                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
 10421 00000480 291E[9004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023 
 10422 00000484 E2EF                    		loop	regularyear	; }
 10423                                  					;
 10424                                  					; should never fall through loop
 10425                                  leapyear:	
 10426 00000486 C606[9704]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
 10427                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
 10428                                  					; change month table.
 10429                                  yeardone:				
 10430 0000048B 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 10431 0000048D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10432 0000048F A1[9004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
 10433                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
 10434 00000492 BE[9604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
 10435                                  		;mov	cx, 12
 10436                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10437 00000495 B10C                    		mov	cl, 12
 10438                                  months:					
 10439 00000497 FEC3                    		inc	bl
 10440                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10441 00000499 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:04B7h
 10442 0000049B 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
 10443                                  					; dh=0
 10444 0000049D 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
 10445 0000049F 46                      		inc	si		; next month
 10446 000004A0 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
 10447 000004A2 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
 10448                                  					; should never fall through loop
 10449                                  month_done:	
 10450 000004A4 C606[9704]1C            		mov	byte [february], 28 ; 08/08/2023
 10451                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 28
 10452                                  					; restore month table value
 10453 000004A9 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
 10454 000004AB 8A36[9504]              		mov	dh, [base_year]
 10455 000004AF 8A0E[9404]              		mov	cl, [base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
 10456 000004B3 E81600                  		call	bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
 10457                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
 10458 000004B6 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
 10459 000004B8 E81100                  		call	bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
 10460 000004BB 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
 10461 000004BD E80C00                  		call	bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
 10462 000004C0 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
 10463 000004C2 E80700                  		call	bintobcd	; ch = bcd century

 10465 000004C7 8F06[9004]              		pop	word [daycnt] ; restore original value

 10470                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
 10471                                  
 10472                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
 10473                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
 10474                                  		
 10475 000004CC D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
 10476 000004CE D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
 10477                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0
 10478 000004D0 C3                      		retn

 10481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10482                                  
 10483                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10484                                  
 10485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10486                                  ; gettime reads date and time
 10487                                  ; and returns the following information:
 10488                                  ;
 10489                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
 10490                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
 10491                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
 10492                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
 10493                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
 10494                                  ;
 10495                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
 10496                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
 10497                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
 10498                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10499                                  
 10500                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
 10501 000004D1 E84B00                  		call	GetTickCnt
 10502 000004D4 8B36[9004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
 10503                                  
 10504                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
 10505                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
 10506                                  ;
 10507                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
 10508                                  ;	       ----------------
 10509                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
 10510                                  ;
 10511                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
 10512                                  ;
 10513                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
 10514                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
 10515                                  ;		1,193,180
 10516                                  ;
 10517                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
 10518                                  ;
 10519                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
 10520                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
 10521                                  ;		59,659
 10522                                  ;
 10523                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
 10524                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
 10525                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
 10526                                  ;
 10527                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
 10528                                  ; multiply by 5
 10529                                  
 10530 000004D8 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10531 000004DA 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
 10532                                  					; multiply by 5
 10533 000004DC D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 10534 000004DE D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
 10535 000004E0 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
 10536 000004E2 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
 10537 000004E4 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
 10538 000004E6 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
 10539 000004E8 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
 10540                                  
 10541                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
 10542                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
 10543                                  
 10544 000004E9 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
 10545 000004EC F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
 10546                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
 10547                                  
 10548                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 10549                                  		;mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
 10550 000004EE 93                      		xchg	bx, ax
 10551 000004EF 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
 10552 000004F1 F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
 10553                                  
 10554                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
 10555                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
 10556                                  
 10557 000004F3 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
 10558 000004F5 B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		; extract 1/100's
 10559                                  
 10560                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
 10561                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
 10562                                  
 10563 000004F8 F7F1                    		div	cx
 10564 000004FA 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
 10565 000004FD 7203                    		jb	short noadj
 10566 000004FF 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
 10567                                  noadj:					
 10568 00000502 F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
 10569 00000503 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
 10570                                  
 10571                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
 10572                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
 10573                                  
 10574 00000505 D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
 10575 00000507 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
 10576 00000509 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
 10577 0000050B B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
 10578 0000050E F7F1                    		div	cx
 10579 00000510 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
 10580 00000512 F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
 10581 00000514 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
 10582                                  
 10583                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
 10584                                  
 10585                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10586                                  		;push	ax
 10587                                  		;mov	ax, si		; daycnt
 10588 00000516 96                      		xchg	ax, si
 10589 00000517 AB                      		stosw
 10590                                  		;pop	ax
 10591 00000518 96                      		xchg	ax, si		; al = hours, ah = minutes
 10592 00000519 AB                      		stosw
 10593 0000051A 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
 10594 0000051C AB                      		stosw
 10595 0000051D F8                      		clc			; [es:di] = count of days since 1-1-80
 10596                                  					;   [es:di+2] = hours
 10597                                  					;   [es:di+3] = minutes
 10598                                  					;   [es:di+4] = seconds
 10599                                  					;   [es:di+5] = hundredths of seconds
 10600 0000051E C3                      		retn
 10601                                  
 10602                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10603                                  
 10604                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10605                                  
 10606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10607                                  ;
 10608                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
 10609                                  ;
 10610                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
 10611                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
 10612                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
 10613                                  ;
 10614                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
 10615                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
 10616                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
 10617                                  ;			else
 10618                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
 10619                                  ;		}
 10620                                  ;
 10621                                  ; USES : AX
 10622                                  ;
 10623                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
 10624                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
 10625                                  ;
 10626                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10627                                  
 10628                                  		; 17/10/2022
 10629                                  GetTickCnt:	
 10630 0000051F 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10631 00000521 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
 10632                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
 10633                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
 10634                                  					; midnight
 10635                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
 10636 00000523 803E[9204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
 10637 00000528 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
 10638 0000052A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
 10639                                  					; and not flag
 10640 0000052C 0106[9004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
 10641 00000530 C3                      		retn
 10642                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10643                                  
 10644                                  inc_case:				
 10645 00000531 08C0                    		or	al, al
 10646 00000533 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
 10647 00000535 FF06[9004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
 10648                                  no_rollover:				
 10649 00000539 C3                      		retn
 10650
