 13295                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 13296                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 13297                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 13298                                  		
 13299                                  		; 19/10/2022	
 13300 00000F6A 06                      		push	es
 13301 00000F6B C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header
 13302 00000F6F 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13303 00000F73 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 13304 00000F77 A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax
 13305 00000F7A 268B4701                		mov	ax, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_HEAD]
 13306 00000F7E A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; Assume heads < 256!!!
 13307 00000F81 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 13308 00000F85 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 13309 00000F89 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 13310                                  					; Get transfer address
 13311                                  
 13312                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 13313

 13315 00000F91 07                      		pop	es
 13316                                  
 13317                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 13318                                  
 13319                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13320                                  
 13321                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13322                                  
 13323                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13324                                  ;
 13325                                  ; TrackIo:
 13326                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 13327                                  ;
 13328                                  ;   input:
 13329                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 13330                                  ;		  3 = write
 13331                                  ;		  4 = verify
 13332                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 13333                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 13334                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 13335                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 13336                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 13337                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 13338                                  ;
 13339                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13340                                  
 13341                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13342                                  		
 13343                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13344                                  TrackIo:	
 13345                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 13346 00000F92 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 13347 00000F96 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 13348 00000F99 803E[D005]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13349                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 13350 00000F9E 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 13351 00000FA0 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 13352 00000FA1 51                      		push	cx
 13353 00000FA2 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 13354 00000FA5 59                      		pop	cx
 13355 00000FA6 58                      		pop	ax
 13356                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 13357 00000FA7 BE[D304]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 13358 00000FAA D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13359 00000FAC D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13360 00000FAE 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 13361                                  
 13362                                  		; WE WANT:
 13363                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 13364                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 13365                                  		
 13366 00000FB0 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 13367                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13368 00000FB3 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 13369                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13370                                  					; good_tracklayout
 13371 00000FB8 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 13372                                  		
 13373 00000FBA 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 13374                                  ionextsector:				
 13375 00000FBC 51                      		push	cx
 13376 00000FBD 52                      		push	dx
 13377 00000FBE 46                      		inc	si
 13378 00000FBF 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 13379                                  					; the track table
 13380 00000FC0 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 13381 00000FC1 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 13382                                  
 13383                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 13384                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 13385                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 13386                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 13387                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 13388                                  		
 13389                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13390 00000FC4 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 13391                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13392                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 13393 00000FC9 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 13394                                  		; 12/12/2022

 13396                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 13397                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 13398 00000FD0 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 13399 00000FD2 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 13400 00000FD6 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 13401 00000FD8 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 13402 00000FDB 5A                      		pop	dx
 13403 00000FDC 59                      		pop	cx
 13404 00000FDD F8                      		clc
 13405 00000FDE C3                      		retn
 13406                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13407                                  
 13408                                  IoRemovable:				
 13409 00000FDF AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 13410                                  					; table	and save it
 13411 00000FE0 50                      		push	ax
 13412 00000FE1 56                      		push	si
 13413 00000FE2 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 13414 00000FE3 50                      		push	ax
 13415 00000FE4 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 13416                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 13417 00000FE8 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 13418 00000FEC 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 13419 00000FEF 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 13420 00000FF2 58                      		pop	ax
 13421 00000FF3 1F                      		pop	ds
 13422 00000FF4 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13423 00000FF6 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 13424 00000FF9 E8F5FA                  		call	Disk
 13425 00000FFC 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 13426                                  					; sector size
 13427 00000FFD 58                      		pop	ax
 13428

 13430                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 13431 00000FFE 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 13432 00001000 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 13433 00001003 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 13434

 13436 00001007 5A                      		pop	dx
 13437 00001008 59                      		pop	cx

 13439 0000100B 803E[D005]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 13441                                  		; 12/12/2022

 13444                                  					; entries in Dpt.

 13450                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

 13452                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13453                                  ;
 13454                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 13455                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 13456                                  ; are permissible.
 13457                                  ;

 13459                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 13460                                  ; All other registers preserved

 13492                                  ;
 13493                                  ; SetDASD
 13494                                  ;
 13495                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 13496                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 13497                                  ;

 13501                                  
 13502                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13503                                  SetDasd:
 13504 00001017 803E[D105]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 13505                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 13506 0000101C 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 13507                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13508 0000101E 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 13509                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13510                                  					; set_dasd_true
 13511 00001023 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 13512                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13513 00001025 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 13514                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13515                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 13516                                  DoSetDasd:
 13517 0000102A C606[D105]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 13518 0000102F C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 13519 00001034 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 13520                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13521 00001036 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 13522 0000103A 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 13523                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 13524                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 13525 0000103D 7415                    		jz	short DoSet

 13568 0000106A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 13569                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 13570                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 13571 0000106C 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13572 00001070 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 13575                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13576                                  
 13577                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13578                                  
 13579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13580                                  ;
 13581                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13582                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13583                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13584                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13585                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13586                                  ;
 13587                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13588                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13589                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13590                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13591                                  ;
 13592                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13593                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13594                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13595                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13596                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13597                                  ;
 13598                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13599                                  
 13600                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13601                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13602 00001075 51                      		push	cx
 13603 00001076 52                      		push	dx
 13604                                  
 13605                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13606                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13607                                  
 13608 00001077 803E[D105]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13609 0000107C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13610 0000107E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13611 00001080 803E[D005]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13612 00001085 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13613 00001087 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13615                                  
 13616                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13617 00001089 06                      		push	es
 13618 0000108A 56                      		push	si
 13619                                  
 13620                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13621                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 13622 0000108B 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 13623 0000108D 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13624                                  
 13625 0000108F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13626                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13627                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13628 00001094 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13629 00001098 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13630                                  
 13631                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 13632                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13633                                  
 13634 0000109C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13635 000010A1 5E                      		pop	si
 13636 000010A2 07                      		pop	es
 13637                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 13638 000010A3 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13639 000010A7 49                      		dec	cx
 13640 000010A8 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 13641 000010AB D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13642 000010AD D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13643 000010AF 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 13644 000010B1 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13645 000010B5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13646 000010B9 06                      		push	es
 13647 000010BA 1E                      		push	ds
 13648 000010BB 56                      		push	si
 13649 000010BC 57                      		push	di
 13650 000010BD B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13651 000010BF CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13652                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13653 000010C1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13654 000010C3 803E[D105]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13655 000010C8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13656 000010CA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13657                                  
 13658                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13659                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13660 000010CB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13661 000010CD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13662 000010CF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13663                                  
 13664 000010D0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13665                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13666                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13667 000010D5 8936[D205]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 13668 000010D9 8C06[D405]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 13669                                  
 13670                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13671                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13672                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 13673                                  		;mov	es, si
 13674 000010DD 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13675                                  
 13676                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 13677 000010DE 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 13678                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 13679 000010E3 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 13680 000010E8 C606[D005]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13681                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 13682 000010ED 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 13683                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 13684 000010EF A2[D105]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 13685 000010F2 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 13686                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13691

 13693                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 13694 000010F9 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 13695 000010FB 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR

 13700 00001100 48                      		dec	ax

 13713                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 13714                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13715                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 13722                                  					; Media	not present.

 13732                                  
 13733                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13734                                  
 13735                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13736                                  
 13737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13738                                  ;
 13739                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13740                                  ;
 13741                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13742                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13743                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13744                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13745                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 13746                                  ;
 13747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13748                                  
 13749                                  ResetDisk:
 13750 00001109 50                      		push	ax
 13751                                  
 13752                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13753 0000110A B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 13754 0000110D 3806[D005]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 13755                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 13761                                  ResetDisk_cont:

 13765                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 13772                                  
 13773                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13774                                  
 13775                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13776                                  ;
 13777                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13778                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13779                                  ;
 13780                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13781                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13782                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13783                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13784                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13785                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13786                                  ;
 13787                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13788                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13789                                  ;
 13790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13791                                  
 13792                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13793                                  ToRom:	
 13794 0000111F 53                      		push	bx
 13795 00001120 56                      		push	si
 13796                                  
 13797                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 13798                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 13799                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 13800                                  
 13801 00001121 F606[D005]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13802 00001126 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt

 13804 00001129 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13805 0000112A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 13806                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?

 13810 00001134 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 13815

 13822                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation

 13825 00001155 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK

 13829 0000115D 58                      		pop	ax

 13848                                  
 13849                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13850                                  ;
 13851                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13852                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13853                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13854                                  ;
 13855                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13856                                  
 13857                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13858                                  ioctl_getown:
 13859 00001177 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13860 0000117A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13861                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13862 0000117E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13863                                  ownloop:				
 13864 00001182 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13865 00001186 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13866                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13867 00001188 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13868                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13869                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13870 0000118D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13871                                  getnextBDS:				
 13872 0000118F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13873 00001192 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13874                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13875                                  
 13876                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13877                                  ;
 13878                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13879                                  ; in al to al.
 13880                                  ;
 13881                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13882

 13892                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13893                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn

 13974                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13975                                  ;	get media id
 13976                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13977                                  ;
 13978                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13979                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13980                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13981                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13982                                  ;
 13983                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13984                                  ;
 13985                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13986                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13987                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13988                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13989                                  ;
 13990                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13991                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13992                                  ;
 13993                                  ; LOGIC:
 13994                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13995                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13996                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13997                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13998                                  ;
 13999                                  ; {
 14000                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 14001                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 14002                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 14003                                  ;	if (no error) then
 14004                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 14005                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 14006                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 14007                                  ;		};
 14008                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 14009                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 14010                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 14011                                  ;		};
 14012                                  ;	else
 14013                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 14014                                  ;
 14015                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14016                                  
 14017                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 14018                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 14019                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 14020                                  
 14021                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14022                                  GetMediaId:
 14023 000011E8 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 14024 000011EB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 14025 000011EF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 14026 000011F4 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 14027 000011F7 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 14028                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 14029 000011F9 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 14030                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 14031 000011FE 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 14032                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14033 00001200 BE[7801]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 14034 00001203 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 14035                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 14036                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14037 00001206 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 14038 00001208 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 14039 0000120C 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14040                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14041 00001210 46                      		inc	si
 14042                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 14043                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 14044 00001211 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 14045 00001214 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14046                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 14047                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 14048 00001217 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 14049                                  	
 14050                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14051                                  		; cf = 0
 14052                                  		;clc
 14053                                  
 14054 00001219 C3                      		retn
 14055                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14056                                  
 14057                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 14058 0000121A B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 14059 0000121C F9                      		stc
 14060                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 14061 0000121D C3                      		retn
 14062                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14063                                  
 14064                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14065                                  
 14066                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14067                                  ;  set media id
 14068                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14069                                  
 14070                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 14071                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 14072                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 14073                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 14074                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 14075                                  ;	    the bds table.
 14076                                  ;
 14077                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 14078                                  ;
 14079                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 14080                                  ;	    the request packet.
 14081                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 14082                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 14083                                  ;
 14084                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 14085                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 14086                                  ;
 14087                                  ; logic:
 14088                                  ;
 14089                                  ; {
 14090                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 14091                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 14092                                  ;	BootIo;
 14093                                  ;	if (no error) then
 14094                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 14095                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 14096                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 14097                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 14098                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 14099                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 14100                                  ;		};
 14101                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 14102                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 14103                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 14104                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 14105                                  ;		};
 14106                                  ;	else
 14107                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 14108                                  ;
 14109                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14110                                  
 14111                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14112                                  SetMediaId:
 14113 0000121E E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 14114 00001221 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14115                                  					; Logical drive	number
 14116 00001225 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 14117 00001227 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 14118 0000122C 52                      		push	dx
 14119 0000122D E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14120 00001230 5A                      		pop	dx
 14121 00001231 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 14122                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 14123 00001233 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 14124                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 14125 00001238 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 14126 0000123A 803E[7801]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 14127                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14128 0000123F 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 14129 00001241 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 14130 00001242 57                      		push	di
 14131 00001243 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 14132 00001244 07                      		pop	es
 14133 00001245 BF[7901]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 14134 00001248 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 14135 0000124C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14136 0000124F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 14137 00001252 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14138                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 14139                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 14140 00001255 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14141 00001257 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 14142 00001258 1F                      		pop	ds
 14143 00001259 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 14144 0000125A 07                      		pop	es
 14145 0000125B E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 14146 0000125E 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 14147 00001260 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 14148 00001265 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 14149 00001268 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14150                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 14151                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 14152 0000126D C3                      		retn
 14153                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14154                                  
 14155                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 14156 0000126E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media

 14161                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14162                                  
 14163                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14164                                  
 14165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14166                                  ;	BootIo
 14167                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14168                                  ;
 14169                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 14170                                  ;
 14171                                  ; input :
 14172                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 14173                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 14174                                  ;
 14175                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 14176                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 14177                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 14178                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 14179                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 14180                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 14181                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 14182                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 14183                                  ;
 14184                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 14185                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 14186                                  ;
 14187                                  ; logic:
 14188                                  ;
 14189                                  ; {
 14190                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 14191                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 14192                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 14193                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 14194                                  ; }
 14195                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14196                                  
 14197                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14198                                  BootIo:	
 14199 00001272 06                      		push	es
 14200 00001273 57                      		push	di
 14201 00001274 53                      		push	bx
 14202 00001275 1E                      		push	ds
 14203 00001276 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 14204                                  
 14205                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 14206                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 14207                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14208                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 14209                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 14210                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 14211                                  
 14212 00001277 BF[5201]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 14213 0000127A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 14214 0000127C 8916[C304]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 14215 00001280 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 14216 00001283 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 14217 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 14218 00001287 5F                      		pop	di
 14219 00001288 07                      		pop	es
 14220 00001289 C3                      		retn

 14225                                  
 14226                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14227                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 14228                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14229                                  ;
 14230                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 14231                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 14232                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 14233                                  ; history in the flags.
 14234                                  ;
 14235                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 14236                                  ;
 14237                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 14238                                  ;
 14239                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 14240                                  ;
 14241                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 14242                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 14243                                  ;
 14244                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14245                                  
 14246                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 14247 0000128A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14248 0000128E 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 14249 00001290 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 14250                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14251 00001292 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 14252                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14253                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 14254 00001297 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14255 00001299 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 14256 0000129E 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14257 000012A0 E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 14258 000012A3 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 14259                                  
 14260                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 14261                                  
 14262 000012A5 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14263 000012A7 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14264                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14265                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14266 000012A9 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 14267 000012AB 53                      		push	bx
 14268 000012AC BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 14269                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 14270                                  					; physical drive
 14271 000012AF E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 14272 000012B2 5B                      		pop	bx
 14273                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 14274 000012B3 C3                      		retn
 14275                                  
 14276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14277                                  
 14278                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14279                                  
 14280                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14281                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 14282                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14283                                  ;
 14284                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 14285                                  ;
 14286                                  ; INPUT :
 14287                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 14288                                  ;
 14289                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 14290                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 14291                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14292                                  
 14293                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14294                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 14295 000012B4 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 14296 000012B8 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14297                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 14298                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14299 000012BB 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 14300                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14301 000012BD 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 14302                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14303                                  					; unformatted_media
 14304 000012C2 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 14305 000012C4 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 14306                                  
 14307                                  GafDone:				
 14308 000012C6 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14309 000012C9 C3                      		retn
 14310                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14311                                  
 14312                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14313                                  
 14314                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14315                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 14316                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14317                                  ;
 14318                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 14319                                  ;
 14320                                  ; input :
 14321                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 14322                                  ;
 14323                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 14324                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14325                                  
 14326                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14327                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 14328 000012CA C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 14329 000012CE C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14330                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14331 000012D1 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 14332                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14333                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 14334 000012D6 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 14335 000012DA 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 14336                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14337 000012DC 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 14338                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14339                                  					; unformatted_media
 14340                                  saf_Done:				
 14341 000012E1 C3                      		retn
 14342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14343

 14346                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14347                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 14348                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14349                                  ;
 14350                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 14351                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 14352                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 14353                                  ;
 14354                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14355                                  
 14356                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14357                                  ioctl_support_query:
 14358 000012E2 06                      		push	es
 14359 000012E3 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 14360 000012E7 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 14361                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 14362                                  
 14363                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14364                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 14365                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 14366                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 14367                                  
 14368 000012EB 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 14369                                  					; See if major code is 8
 14370 000012ED 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 14371                                  ioctl_support:
 14372 000012EF 0E                      		push	cs
 14373 000012F0 07                      		pop	es
 14374                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14375                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14376 000012F1 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 14377                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14378 000012F4 BF[D50C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 14379                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 14380                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 14381 000012F7 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 14382 000012F9 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 14383 000012FB 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 14384 000012FD B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 14385                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14386                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 14387                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 14388                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 14389                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 14390                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14391                                  ioctlsupexit:
 14392 00001300 07                      		pop	es
 14393                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14394                                  		; cf = 0
 14395                                  		;clc
 14396 00001301 C3                      		retn
 14397                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14398                                  nosupport:
 14399 00001302 07                      		pop	es
 14400 00001303 E9D3ED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 14401                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 14403                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14404                                  
 14405                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14406                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 14407                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14408                                  ;
 14409                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 14410                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 14411                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 14412                                  ;	    drive)
 14413                                  ;
 14414                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 14415                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 14416                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 14417                                  ;
 14418                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 14419                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 14420                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 14421                                  ;
 14422                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 14423                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 14424                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14425                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 14426                                  ;
 14427                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 14428                                  ;
 14429                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 14430                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 14431                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 14432                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 14433                                  ; 
 14434                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14435                                  
 14436                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14437                                  SenseMediaType:				
 14438 00001306 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 14439 0000130A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14440                                  		; 10/10/2022
 14441                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 14442 0000130D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14443 0000130F 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 14444                                  		;
 14445 00001311 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14446                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 14447                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14448                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 14449 00001315 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 14450                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 14451 00001317 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 14452 00001319 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 14453 0000131B FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 14454                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 14455 0000131D FEC8                    		dec	al
 14456 0000131F 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 14457 00001321 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14458 00001323 0404                    		add	al, 4
 14459 00001325 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 14460 00001327 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 14461 00001329 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 14462 0000132B 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 14463                                  GotMediaType:				
 14464 0000132D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 14465                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14466                                  		; cf = 0
 14467                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 14468 00001330 C3                      		retn
 14469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14470                                  
 14471                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 14472 00001331 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 14473 00001334 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 14474 00001336 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 14475 00001338 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 14476 0000133B 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 14477                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 14478 0000133D B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 14479                                  SenseErrExit:				
 14480 0000133F B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 14481 00001341 F9                      		stc
 14482 00001342 C3                      		retn
 14483                                  
 14484                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14485                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14486                                  		;db    0
 14487                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14488                                  
 14489                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14490                                  
 14491                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14492                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 14493                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14494                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14495                                  
 14496                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 14497                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 14498                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 14499                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 14500                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 14501                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 14502                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 14503                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 14504                                  ;
 14505                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 14506                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 14507                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 14508                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 14509                                  ;
 14510                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 14511                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 14512                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 14513                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 14514                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 14515                                  ;
 14516                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 14517                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 14518                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 14519                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 14520                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 14521                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 14522                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 14523                                  
 14524                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 14525                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 14526                                  
 14527                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14528                                  
 14529                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 14530 00001343 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 14531 00001346 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 14532 00001348 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 14533 0000134B 7431                    		jz	short mine
 14534                                  
 14535                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 14536                                  
 14537 0000134D 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 14538 00001350 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 14539 00001352 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 14540 00001355 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14541 00001357 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14542                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14543                                  
 14544                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14545 0000135A CF                      		iret
 14546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14547                                  
 14548                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 14549 0000135B 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 14550 0000135C 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 14551                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 14552                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 14553                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 14554 0000135E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 14555                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14556                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 14557                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 14558                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 14559                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 14560                                  		
 14561                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14562                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 14563 00001363 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 14564                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 14565 00001367 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 14566                                  
 14567                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 14568                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 14569                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 14570                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 14571                                  		
 14572                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 14573                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14574 0000136B 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 14575 0000136F A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 14576                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 14577                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14578 00001372 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 14579 00001376 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 14580                                  
 14581 0000137A 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 14582                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14583                                  		;pop	bx
 14584 0000137B 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 14585                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 14586 0000137C 58                      		pop	ax
 14587                                  i2f_iret:
 14588 0000137D CF                      		iret
 14589                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14590                                  
 14591                                  mine:
 14592 0000137E 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 14593 00001380 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 14594 00001382 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 14595 00001384 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 14596 00001386 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 14597                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 14598                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14599 00001388 CF                      		iret
 14600                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14601                                  
 14602                                  disp_func:
 14603 00001389 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 14604 0000138B 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 14605 0000138D 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 14606 0000138F 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 14607                                  
 14608                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 14609                                  
 14610 00001391 1E                      		push	ds
 14611 00001392 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 14612                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14613                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 14614                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14615                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 14616                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 14617 00001397 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 14618 0000139B 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 14619 0000139F 1F                      		pop	ds
 14620                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 14621                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 14622                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1708h
 14623 000013A0 EA[8506]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry ; BIOSDATA:dsk_entry
 14624                                  		;; 17/10/2022
 14625                                  		;;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 14626                                  		;jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 14627                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 14628                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 14629                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 14630                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 14631                                  
 14632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14633                                  
 14634                                  do_subfun_01:
 14635 000013A5 06                      		push	es
 14636 000013A6 1E                      		push	ds
 14637 000013A7 1E                      		push	ds
 14638 000013A8 07                      		pop	es
 14639                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14640 000013A9 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 14641                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14642                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 14643 000013AE E8BC03                  		call	install_bds
 14644 000013B1 1F                      		pop	ds
 14645 000013B2 07                      		pop	es
 14646                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 14647                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14648 000013B3 CF                      		iret
 14649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14650                                  
 14651                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 14652                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14653 000013B4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 14654                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14655 000013B9 C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 14656                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 14657                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 14658                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 14659                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14660 000013BD CF                      		iret
 14661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14662                                  
 14663                                  ; 17/10/2022
 14664                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14665                                  
 14666                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 14667                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 14668                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 14669                                  
 14670                                  win386call:				
 14671 000013BE 1E                      		push	ds
 14672 000013BF 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14673                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14674                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h

 14676                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?

 14679                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 14680 000013CA 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 14681                                  		; 12/12/2022

 14685                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 14686 000013D1 8026[3908]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 14687 000013D6 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret

 14718                                  		; 10/12/2022

 14722 000013FC 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA

 14724 00001400 F7D3                    		not	bx
