 15836                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15837                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15838                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15839                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15840                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15841                                  
 15842                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15843 000017F4 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15844 000017F6 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15844 000017FF 736B6574746520666F-
 15844 00001808 7220647269766520   
 15845                                  
 15846                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15847 00001810 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15847 00001819 65737320616E79206B-
 15847 00001822 6579207768656E2072-
 15847 0000182B 656164790D0A       
 15848 00001831 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15849                                  
 15850                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15851                                  
 15852                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15853                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15854                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15855                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15856                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15857                                  
 15858                                  chkopcnt:		
 15859 00001833 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15860 00001838 C3                      		retn
 15861                                  
 15862                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15863                                  
 15864                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15865                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15866                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15867                                  ;
 15868                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15869                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15870                                  
 15871                                  mediacheck:	
 15872 00001839 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15873 0000183C 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15874 0000183E E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15875 00001841 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15876 00001843 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15877 00001846 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15878 00001848 50                      		push	ax
 15879 00001849 52                      		push	dx
 15880 0000184A 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15881                                  					; set logical drive number
 15882 0000184E B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15883 00001850 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15884                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15885                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15886 00001852 5A                      		pop	dx
 15887 00001853 58                      		pop	ax
 15888 00001854 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15889 00001856 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15890                                  
 15891                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15892                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15893                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15894                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15895                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15896                                  ; status.
 15897                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15898 00001859 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15899 0000185D 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15900                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15901                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15902                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15903                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15904 00001861 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15905                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15906                                  
 15907                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15908                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15909                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15910                                  
 15911 00001863 50                      		push	ax
 15912 00001864 51                      		push	cx
 15913 00001865 52                      		push	dx
 15914 00001866 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15915 00001869 5A                      		pop	dx
 15916 0000186A 59                      		pop	cx
 15917 0000186B 58                      		pop	ax
 15918 0000186C 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15919 0000186E 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15920                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15921 00001870 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15922                                  mediaret:				
 15923 00001872 C3                      		retn
 15924                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15925                                  
 15926                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15927                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15928                                  ; or write.
 15929                                  
 15930                                  mediadovolid:				
 15931 00001873 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15932 00001876 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15933 00001878 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15934 0000187B 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15935 0000187D E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15936                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15937                                  
 15938                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15939                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15940                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15941                                  ; dos.
 15942                                  ;
 15943                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15944                                  
 15945                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15946                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15947                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15948                                  
 15949                                  checklatchio:	
 15950                                  
 15951                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15952                                  			
 15953 00001880 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15954 00001883 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15955                                  
 15956                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15957                                  
 15958 00001885 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15959 00001888 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15960                                  
 15961                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15962                                  ; expensive verification.
 15963                                  
 15964 0000188A E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15965 0000188D 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15966 0000188F E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15967 00001892 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15968 00001894 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15969 00001896 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15970 00001898 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15971                                  checklatchret:				
 15972 0000189B E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15973                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15974 0000189E F9                      		stc
 15975 0000189F 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15976                                  checkret:				
 15977 000018A0 C3                      		retn
 15978                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15979                                  
 15980                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15981                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15982                                  ;
 15983                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15984                                  
 15985                                  checkfatvid:				
 15986 000018A1 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15987 000018A4 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15988 000018A6 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15989                                  
 15990                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15991                                  
 15992                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15993                                  
 15994                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15995                                  
 15996                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15997                                  ;
 15998                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15999                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 16000                                  ;
 16001                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 16002                                  ;
 16003                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 16004                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 16005                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 16006                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 16007                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 16008                                  ;
 16009                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 16010                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 16011                                  ; routine.)
 16012                                  ;
 16013                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 16014                                  
 16015                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16016                                  check_vid:
 16017                                  
 16018                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 16019                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 16020                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 16021                                  
 16022 000018A8 803E[7801]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 16023                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 16024                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 16025 000018AD 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 16026 000018AF E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 16027 000018B2 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 16028 000018B4 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 16029 000018B6 803E[6201]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 16030                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 16031 000018BB 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 16032                                  					; if not fat system
 16033 000018BD E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 16034 000018C0 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 16035 000018C2 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 16036 000018C5 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 16037                                  					; definitely changed
 16038 000018C8 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 16039                                  
 16040 000018CA 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 16041                                  vid_no_changed:				
 16042 000018CB E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 16043                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16044                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 16045                                  		;clc
 16046                                  checkfatret:				
 16047 000018CE C3                      		retn
 16048                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16049                                  
 16050                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16051                                  changed_drv:
 16052 000018CF F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 16053 000018D0 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 16054                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 16055 000018D5 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 16056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16057                                  
 16058                                  ; extended id check
 16059                                  
 16060                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16061                                  
 16062                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 16063                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 16064                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 16065                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 16066                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 16067                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 16068                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 16069                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 16070                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 16071                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 16072                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 16073                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 16074                                  ;
 16075                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 16076                                  
 16077                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16078                                  do_ext_check_id:
 16079 000018D6 50                      		push	ax
 16080                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 16081                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 16082 000018D7 A1[7901]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 16083                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16084 000018DA 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16085 000018DC 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 16086 000018E0 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 16087 000018E2 A1[7B01]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 16088 000018E5 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 16089 000018E9 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 16090                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 16091                                  					; don't know
 16092 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 16093 000018EC EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 16094                                  					; reset the flag
 16095                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16096                                  
 16097                                  ext_changed:
 16098 000018EE 58                      		pop	ax
 16099                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16100 000018EF 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 16101                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 16102                                  					; disk changed!
 16103                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16104                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 16105                                  		;clc
 16106 000018F0 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 16107                                  
 16108                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16109                                  
 16110                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 16111                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 16112                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 16113                                  ;
 16114                                  ; es:di -> bds
 16115                                  
 16116                                  checkio:				
 16117 000018F2 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 16118 000018F5 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 16119 000018F7 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 16120 000018FA 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 16121 000018FC E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 16122 000018FF 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 16123 00001901 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 16124 00001904 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 16125 00001906 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 16126 00001908 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 16127 0000190A 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 16128 0000190B C3                      		retn
 16129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16130                                  
 16131                                  checkioerr:				
 16132 0000190C E80700                  		call	returnvid
 16133                                  
 16134                                  checkioret:				
 16135 0000190F F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 16136 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 16137                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16138                                  
 16139                                  no_error_map:				
 16140 00001913 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 16141                                  
 16142                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16143                                  
 16144                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 16145                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 16146                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 16147                                  
 16148                                  returnvid:		
 16149 00001916 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 16150                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 16151 00001919 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 16152 0000191C B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 16153 0000191E F9                      		stc
 16154 0000191F C3                      		retn
 16155                                  
 16156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16157                                  
 16158                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 16159                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 16160                                  ;
 16161                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 16162                                  ; **trashes si**
 16163                                  
 16164                                  media_set_vid:				
 16165 00001920 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 16166                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 16167                                  
 16168                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 16169                                  
 16170                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16171                                  
 16172                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 16173                                  
 16174                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16175                                  vid_into_packet:
 16176 00001923 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 16177 00001924 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16178 00001928 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16179 0000192B 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 16180 0000192D 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16181 00001930 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 16182 00001933 1F                      		pop	ds
 16183                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 16184 00001934 C3                      		retn
 16185                                  
 16186                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16187                                  
 16188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16189                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 16190                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 16191                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 16192                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 16193                                  ;
 16194                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 16195                                  ;		ah has media byte
 16196                                  ;
 16197                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 16198                                  ;		    no registers modified
 16199                                  ;		carry set
 16200                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 16201                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 16202                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 16203                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 16204                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 16205                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 16206                                  ;
 16207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16208                                  
 16209                                  hidensity:
 16210                                  
 16211                                  ; check for correct drive
 16212                                  		
 16213                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16214 00001935 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16215                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 16216                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 16217 0000193A 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 16218                                  
 16219                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 16220                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 16221                                  
 16222 0000193C 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 16223 00001941 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 16224                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 16225                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 16226 00001943 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 16227 00001946 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 16228                                  
 16229                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 16230                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 16231                                  
 16232                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16233 00001948 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16234 0000194C 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 16235                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16236                                  					; ffOther
 16237 0000194E 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 16238 00001950 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 16239                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16240                                  					; ff288
 16241 00001952 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 16242 00001954 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 16243 00001956 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 16244                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 16245                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 16246 00001959 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 16247                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 16248                                  					; 2 sides
 16249                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16250 0000195C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 16251 0000195D BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 16252                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 16253                                  					; & head max
 16254                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16255 00001960 E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 16256                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16257                                  
 16258                                  Is720K:
 16259                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16260 00001963 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 16261                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16262 00001964 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 16263                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16264                                  
 16265                                  		; 18/12/2022
 16266                                  ;dofloppy:
 16267                                  		;retn
 16268                                  
 16269                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16270                                  
 16271                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16272                                  
 16273                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16274                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 16275                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 16276                                  ;
 16277                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 16278                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 16279                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16280                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 16281                                  ;
 16282                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 16283                                  ;
 16284                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 16285                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16286                                  
 16287                                  set_changed_dl:	
 16288 00001967 06                      		push	es
 16289 00001968 57                      		push	di
 16290                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 16291                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16292 00001969 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 16293                                  
 16294                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 16295                                  
 16296                                  scan_bds:				
 16297 0000196D 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16298 00001971 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 16299                                  
 16300                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 16301                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 16302                                  
 16303 00001973 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16304                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 16305                                  get_next_bds:				
 16306 00001977 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16307                                  					; go to	next bds
 16308 0000197A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 16309 0000197D 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 16310 0000197F 5F                      		pop	di
 16311 00001980 07                      		pop	es
 16312 00001981 C3                      		retn
 16313                                  
 16314                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16315                                  
 16316                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16317                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 16318                                  ;
 16319                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 16320                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 16321                                  ;		zero reset - change
 16322                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16323                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16324                                  
 16325                                  checkromchange:	
 16326                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 16327                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16328 00001982 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 16329                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16330                                  					; fchanged
 16331 00001987 C3                      		retn
 16332                                  
 16333                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16334                                  
 16335                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16336                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 16337                                  ;
 16338                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16339                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16340                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16341                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16342                                  
 16343                                  resetchanged:	
 16344                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 16345                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16346 00001988 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 16347                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16348                                  					; ~fchanged
 16349 0000198D C3                      		retn
 16350                                  
 16351                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16352                                  
 16353                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16354                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 16355                                  ;
 16356                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16357                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 16358                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 16359                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16360                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16361                                  
 16362                                  haschange:
 16363                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 16364                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16365 0000198E 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16366                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16367                                  					; fchangeline
 16368 00001993 C3                      		retn
 16369                                  
 16370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16371                                  
 16372                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16373                                  
 16374                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16375                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 16376                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16377                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 16378                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 16379                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16380                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16381                                  
 16382                                  ; set_volume_id
 16383                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 16384                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 16385                                  ;
 16386                                  ;   on entry:
 16387                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 16388                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 16389                                  ;
 16390                                  ;   on exit:
 16391                                  ;	carry clear:
 16392                                  ;	   successful call
 16393                                  ;	carry set
 16394                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 16395                                  
 16396                                  set_volume_id:				
 16397 00001994 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 16398 00001995 50                      		push	ax
 16399 00001996 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 16400 00001999 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 16401 0000199B E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 16402 0000199E 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 16403 000019A0 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 16404 000019A3 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 16405                                  setvret:				
 16406                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16407                                  		; cf = 0
 16408                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 16409 000019A6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 16410 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 16411 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 16412                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16413                                  
 16414                                  seterr:					
 16415 000019A9 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 16416 000019AA 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 16417 000019AB C3                      		retn
 16418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16419 000019AC 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 16420                                  
 16421                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16422                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 16423                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16424                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 16425                                  
 16426                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16427                                  
 16428                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16429                                  
 16430                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16431                                  ;
 16432                                  ;   on entry:
 16433                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 16434                                  ;
 16435                                  ;   on exit:
 16436                                  ;	carry clear
 16437                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 16438                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 16439                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 16440                                  ;
 16441                                  ;	carry set:
 16442                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 16443                                  
 16444                                  read_volume_id:
 16445 000019AE 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 16446 000019AF 51                      		push	cx
 16447 000019B0 53                      		push	bx
 16448 000019B1 50                      		push	ax
 16449 000019B2 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 16450 000019B3 57                      		push	di
 16451 000019B4 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 16452 000019B5 07                      		pop	es
 16453 000019B6 BF[6C08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16454 000019B9 BE[6008]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16455                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 16456 000019BC B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 16457 000019BF F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16458 000019C1 5F                      		pop	di
 16459 000019C2 07                      		pop	es
 16460 000019C3 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 16461                                  					; # of fats
 16462 000019C7 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 16463                                  					; sectors / fat
 16464 000019CB F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 16465 000019CD 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 16466                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 16467                                  					;
 16468                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 16469                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16470 000019D1 2EA3[AC19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 16471                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 16472                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 16473 000019D5 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 16474                                  					; # root dir entries
 16475 000019D9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 16476 000019DB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 16477                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16478                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 16479 000019DD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16480                                  next_sec:
 16481 000019DE 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 16482 000019DF 2EA1[AC19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16483                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 16484                                  					; get sector #
 16485 000019E3 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16486                                  					; sectors / track
 16487 000019E7 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16488 000019E9 F7F1                    		div	cx
 16489                                  
 16490                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 16491                                  
 16492 000019EB 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 16493                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 16494 000019EC 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 16495 000019EE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16496 000019F0 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 16497                                  					; # heads on this disc
 16498 000019F4 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 16499 000019F6 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 16500 000019F8 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 16501                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 16502 000019FB 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 16503 000019FD B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 16504 00001A00 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 16505                                  fvid_loop:
 16506                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16507 00001A02 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 16508                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 16509 00001A04 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 16510 00001A06 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 16511 00001A09 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 16512 00001A0B 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 16513 00001A0E 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 16514                                  ent_loop:
 16515 00001A10 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 16516 00001A13 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 16517 00001A15 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 16518 00001A16 2EFF06[AC19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16519                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 16520                                  					; next sector
 16521 00001A1B E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 16522                                  notfound:
 16523                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16524                                  		;xor	si, si
 16525 00001A1D EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16526                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16527                                  
 16528                                  found_vid:
 16529                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16530                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 16531 00001A1F 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16532 00001A20 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16533 00001A22 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16534 00001A23 57                      		push	di
 16535 00001A24 1E                      		push	ds
 16536 00001A25 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16537 00001A26 BF[6C08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16538 00001A29 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16539                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16540 00001A2C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16541                                  		;xor	al, al
 16542                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16543 00001A2E 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16544 00001A2F AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16545                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16546                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16547                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16548 00001A30 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16549 00001A31 07                      		pop	es
 16550                                  fvid_ret:
 16551                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16552 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16553                                  				
 16554 00001A34 58                      		pop	ax
 16555                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16556                                  		; cf = 0
 16557                                  		;clc
 16558                                  rvidret:
 16559 00001A35 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16560 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx
 16561 00001A37 5A                      		pop	dx
 16562 00001A38 C3                      		retn
 16563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16564                                  
 16565                                  no_vid:
 16566 00001A39 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16567                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16568                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16569 00001A3A EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16570                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16571                                  
 16572                                  readviderr:
 16573 00001A3C 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16574 00001A3D 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16575 00001A3E EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16576                                  
 16577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16578                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16579                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16580                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16581 00001A40 BE[6C08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16582                                  		;
 16583                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16584                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16585                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16586                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16587 00001A43 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16588 00001A46 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16589                                  		;
 16590 00001A49 FC                      		cld
 16591 00001A4A C3                      		retn
 16592                                  
 16593                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16594                                  
 16595                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16596                                  ;
 16597                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16598                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16599                                  
 16600                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16601 00001A4B 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16602 00001A4C 56                      		push	si
 16603 00001A4D 51                      		push	cx
 16604                                  		
 16605                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16606                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16607                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16608                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16609                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16610                                  		;cld
 16611                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16612 00001A4E E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16613                                  
 16614 00001A51 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16615 00001A53 59                      		pop	cx
 16616 00001A54 5E                      		pop	si
 16617 00001A55 5F                      		pop	di
 16618 00001A56 C3                      		retn
 16619                                  
 16620                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16621                                  
 16622                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16623                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16624                                  ;
 16625                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16626                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16627                                  
 16628                                  check_volume_id:
 16629 00001A57 57                      		push	di
 16630 00001A58 51                      		push	cx
 16631                                  		
 16632                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16633                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16634                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16635                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16636                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16637                                  		;cld
 16638                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16639 00001A59 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16640                                  
 16641 00001A5C F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16642 00001A5E 59                      		pop	cx
 16643 00001A5F 5F                      		pop	di
 16644 00001A60 C3                      		retn
 16645                                  
 16646                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16647                                  
 16648                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16649                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16650                                  ;
 16651                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16652                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16653                                  ;
 16654                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16655                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16656                                  ;
 16657                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16658                                  
 16659                                  fat_check:		
 16660 00001A61 50                      		push	ax
 16661 00001A62 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16662 00001A64 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16663 00001A67 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16664                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16665 00001A6B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16666 00001A6D 4E                      		dec	si
 16667                                  okret1:					
 16668 00001A6E 58                      		pop	ax
 16669 00001A6F C3                      		retn
 16670                                  
 16671                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16672                                  
 16673                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 16674                                  		;times 7 db 0
 16675                                  
 16676                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 16677                                  
 16678                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16679                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 16680                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 16681                                  
 16682                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16683                                  
 16684                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16685                                  		;db 0
 16686                                  
 16687                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 16688                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 16689                                  
 16690                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 16691 00001A70 00<rep 10h>             		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 16692                                  %endif
 16693                                  
 16694                                  ;align 16
 16695                                  
 16696                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16697                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 16698                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16699                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16700                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16701                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16702                                  
 16703                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 16704                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 16705
