 33082                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 33083                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 33084                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33085                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33086                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 33087                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 33088                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33089                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33090                                  
 33091                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33092                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 33093                                  findUMB:
 33094                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33095                                  	;push	ax
 33096                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33097 00002D61 51                      	push	cx ; *
 33098                                  	;push	dx
 33099                                  
 33100 00002D62 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 33101                                  
 33102 00002D64 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 33103                                  
 33104 00002D66 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 33105                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33106                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 33107 00002D69 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 33108                                  
 33109                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33110                                  fu10:
 33111 00002D6B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 33112                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33113                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 33114                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 33115                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 33116                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33117                                  
 33118                                  ;fu10:	
 33119 00002D6D 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 33120 00002D6F 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 33121                                  
 33122 00002D71 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 33123 00002D74 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 33124                                  
 33125 00002D76 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 33126                                  fu20:	
 33127                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33128                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33129                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33130 00002D77 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 33131 00002D7D 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 33132                                  
 33133                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 33134                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33135                                  	; ax = es
 33136                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 33137                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33138 00002D7F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33139 00002D84 40                      	inc	ax
 33140                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33141                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 33142 00002D85 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 33143                                  fuE:	
 33144 00002D87 F9                      	stc
 33145                                  fuX:
 33146                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33147                                  	;pop	dx
 33148                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33149 00002D88 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 33150                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 33151 00002D89 C3                      	retn
 33152                                  
 33153                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33154                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 33155                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33156                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33157                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 33158                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 33159                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 33160                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33161                                  
 33162                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 33163                                  BigFree:
 33164                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33165                                  	;push	bx
 33166 00002D8A 51                      	push	cx
 33167                                  
 33168 00002D8B E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 33169 00002D8E 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 33170                                  
 33171 00002D90 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 33172 00002D92 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 33173                                  
 33174                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33175                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 33176                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 33177                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 33178                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 33179                                  
 33180                                  bf10:	
 33181 00002D94 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 33182 00002D97 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 33183                                  
 33184                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 33185 00002D99 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 33186 00002D9F 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 33187                                  
 33188 00002DA1 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33189                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 33190 00002DA5 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 33191                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 33192                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33193 00002DA7 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 33194                                  
 33195 00002DA9 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 33196                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 33197 00002DAB 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 33198                                  
 33199                                  bf20:	
 33200                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33201                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 33202                                  	; 19/07/2023
 33203                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 33204 00002DAD 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33205 00002DB3 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 33206                                  
 33207                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 33208 00002DB5 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 33209                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33210 00002DB7 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33211 00002DBC 40                      	inc     ax
 33212 00002DBD 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 33213                                  
 33214 00002DBF EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 33215                                  
 33216 00002DC1 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 33217 00002DC3 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 33218 00002DC5 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33219 00002DC7 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 33220                                  bfE:	
 33221 00002DC9 F9                      	stc
 33222                                  bfX:
 33223 00002DCA 59                      	pop	cx
 33224                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33225                                  	;pop	bx
 33226 00002DCB C3                      	retn
 33227                                  
 33228                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33229                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 33230                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33231                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 33232                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 33233                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33234                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33235                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33236                                  
 33237                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 33238                                  
 33239                                  isSpecified:
 33240                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33241                                  	;push	ax
 33242                                  
 33243 00002DCC 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 33244 00002DCE 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 33245                                  
 33246                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 33247                                  	;
 33248                                  	;push	ds
 33249                                  	;push	cs
 33250                                  	;pop	ds
 33251                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 33252                                  	;pop	ds
 33253                                  	
 33254                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 33255                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33256                                  	; ds = cs
 33257 00002DD0 8A87[361F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 33258                                  
 33259 00002DD4 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 33260                                  
 33261                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33262                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33263                                  	;pop	ax
 33264                                  
 33265 00002DD6 C3                      	retn
 33266                                  
 33267                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33268                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 33269                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33270                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 33271                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 33272                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 33273                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33274                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33275                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 33276                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 33277                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 33278                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 33279                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 33280                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33281                                  
 33282                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 33283                                  
 33284                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33285                                  
 33286                                  shrinkMCB:
 33287                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 33288                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33289                                  	;push	bx
 33290 00002DD7 51                      	push	cx
 33291 00002DD8 06                      	push	es
 33292                                  
 33293 00002DD9 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 33294                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33295                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 33296                                  
 33297 00002DDB 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33298                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33299 00002DE0 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 33300                                  
 33301 00002DE2 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33302                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 33303                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 33304                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 33305                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33306                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 33307                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33308 00002DE5 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 33309 00002DE7 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 33310                                  
 33311 00002DE9 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33312                                  	
 33313                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33314                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33315 00002DEE 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33316                                  
 33317 00002DF0 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 33318 00002DF5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 33319                                  
 33320 00002DFB 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 33321 00002DFD 40                      	inc	ax
 33322 00002DFE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 33323                                  
 33324 00002E00 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 33325 00002E02 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 33326                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33327                                  	; ax > 0
 33328 00002E04 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 33329                                  
 33330                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33331 00002E05 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 33332                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 33333 00002E0A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 33334                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33335                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 33336                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 33337                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 33338                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 33339                                  
 33340                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33341 00002E0E E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 33342                                  
 33343                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33344                                  	; cf=0
 33345                                  	;clc
 33346                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33347                                  	;jmp	short smX
 33348                                  smE:	
 33349                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33350                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 33351                                  	;stc
 33352                                  smX:	
 33353                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 33354 00002E11 07                      	pop	es
 33355 00002E12 59                      	pop	cx
 33356                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33357                                  	;pop	bx
 33358 00002E13 C3                      	retn
 33359                                  
 33360                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33361                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 33362                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33363                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 33364                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 33365                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33366                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 33367                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33368                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 33369                                  ;
 33370                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 33371                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 33372                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 33373                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 33374                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 33375                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 33376                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 33377                                  ;       Endif
 33378                                  ;    Endif
 33379                                  ; Endif
 33380                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 33381                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 33382                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 33383                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 33384                                  ;    ENDIF
 33385                                  ; ENDIF
 33386                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33387                                  
 33388                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33389                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 33390                                  _hideUMB_:
 33391                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33392                                  	; ds = cs
 33393                                  
 33394                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33395                                  	;push	bx
 33396                                  	;push	dx
 33397 00002E14 06                      	push	es
 33398                                  
 33399 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33400 00002E17 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 33401 00002E1A 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 33402                                  
 33403 00002E1C 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 33404 00002E1E E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 33405 00002E21 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 33406                                  
 33407 00002E23 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 33408 00002E24 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 33409 00002E26 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 33410 00002E29 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 33411                                  
 33412 00002E2A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 33413 00002E2C 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 33414                                  
 33415 00002E2E 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 33416 00002E30 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 33417                                  
 33418 00002E32 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 33419 00002E34 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 33420 00002E37 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 33421                                  hu_10:	
 33422                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 33423                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 33424                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33425                                  ;isTiny:
 33426                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 33427                                  	;or	al,al
 33428 00002E39 800E[321F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 33429 00002E3E 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 33430                                  
 33431 00002E40 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 33432 00002E43 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 33433                                  
 33434 00002E45 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 33435 00002E47 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 33436                                  
 33437 00002E49 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 33438 00002E4B E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 33439 00002E4E 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 33440                                  
 33441 00002E50 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33442                                  hu_30:	
 33443 00002E52 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33444                                  
 33445 00002E54 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 33446                                  
 33447 00002E57 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 33448 00002E59 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 33449                                  
 33450 00002E5B 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 33451 00002E5D E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 33452                                  hu_X:	
 33453 00002E60 07                      	pop	es
 33454                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33455                                  	;pop	dx
 33456                                  	;pop	bx
 33457 00002E61 C3                      	retn
 33458                                  
 33459                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33460                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 33461                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33462                                  ; Entry:  None
 33463                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 33464                                  ; Error:  None
 33465                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 33466                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33467                                  
 33468                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33469                                  UnFreeze:
 33470                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33471                                  	;push	ax
 33472 00002E62 06                      	push	es
 33473                                  
 33474 00002E63 E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 33475 00002E66 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 33476                                  
 33477                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33478                                  uf10:
 33479 00002E68 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 33480                                  
 33481                                  ; ------------------------------
 33482                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 33483                                  ; ------------------------------
 33484                                  
 33485                                  ;uf10:	
 33486 00002E6A E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 33487 00002E6D 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 33488 00002E6F E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 33489                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33490                                  	; ax <> es
 33491 00002E72 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 33492                                  uf20:	
 33493                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33494                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33495                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33496 00002E74 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33497 00002E7A 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 33498                                  
 33499                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 33500                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33501                                  	; ax = es
 33502                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 33503                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 33504 00002E7C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33505 00002E81 40                      	inc	ax
 33506                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33507                                  	;mov	es,ax
 33508 00002E82 EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 33509                                  ufX:	
 33510 00002E84 07                      	pop	es
 33511                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33512                                  	;pop	ax
 33513 00002E85 C3                      	retn
 33514                                  
 33515                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33516                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 33517                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33518                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 33519                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 33520                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33521                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33522                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33523                                  
 33524                                  isFrozMCB:
 33525                                  	;push	ax
 33526                                  
 33527                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 33528                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 33529 00002E86 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 33530 00002E8C 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 33531                                  
 33532                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 33533                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 33534 00002E8E 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 33535 00002E95 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 33536                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 33537                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 33538 00002E97 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 33539 00002E9E 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 33540                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 33541                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 33542 00002EA0 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 33543 00002EA7 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 33544                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 33545                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33546 00002EA9 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 33547                                  ifmX:	
 33548                                  	;pop	ax
 33549 00002EB0 C3                      	retn
 33550                                  
 33551                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33552                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 33553                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33554                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 33555                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 33556                                  ; ERROR:    None

 33560                                  frezMCB:
 33561 00002EB1 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 33562 00002EB8 26C70608004652          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 33563 00002EBF 26C7060A004F5A          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 33564 00002EC6 26C7060C00454E          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 33565 00002ECD 26C7060E002020          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 33566 00002ED4 C3                      	retn
 33567                                  
 33568                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 33648                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 33653                                  ; ERROR:    None

 34060                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34061                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 34062                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34063                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34064                                  
 34065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34066                                  ;
 34067                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 34068                                  ;
 34069                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 34070                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 34071                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 34072                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 34073                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 34074                                  ;
 34075                                  ;	Output : none
 34076                                  ;
 34077                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 34078                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 34079                                  ;
 34080                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34081                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 34082                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 34083                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 34084                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 34085                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34086                                  
 34087                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34088                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34089                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 34090                                  InitDevLoad:
 34091                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34092                                  	;push	es ; *
 34093                                  
 34094                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34095                                  	; ds = cs
 34096 00002FF3 803E[871F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34097                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 34098                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 34099 00002FF8 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 34100                                  
 34101                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34102                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34103                                  ; %if 0
 34104                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34105 00002FFA 803E[771F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34106                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 34107 00002FFF 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 34108                                  
 34109                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 34110                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 34111                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 34112                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 34113                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 34114                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 34115                                  
 34116 00003001 E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 34117                                  
 34118 00003004 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 34119 00003007 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 34120 0000300A E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 34121 0000300D 9C                      	pushf
 34122 0000300E E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 34123 00003011 9D                      	popf
 34124                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 34125                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 34126                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34127 00003012 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 34128                                  
 34129                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 34130                                  
 34131                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34132                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 34133                                  InitForConv:
 34134                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34135                                  	; ds = cs
 34136 00003014 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 34137                                  					;  current UMB ?
 34138 00003017 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 34139 00003019 E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 34140 0000301C E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 34141                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 34142 0000301F 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 34143                                  					;  in low memory
 34144                                  InitForHi:
 34145                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34146                                  	; ds = cs
 34147                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 34148                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 34149                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 34150 00003021 A1[7D1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 34151 00003024 8B16[791F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34152 00003028 0316[7B1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 34153 0000302C EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 34154                                  
 34155                                  InitForLo:
 34156                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34157                                  	; ds = cs
 34158                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 34159 0000302E C606[871F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 34160                                  initforlo_x:
 34161                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34162                                  	; ds = cs
 34163                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 34164                                  					;  we are loading low
 34165                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 34166                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 34167 00003033 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 34168 00003036 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 34169                                  idl1:
 34170 0000303A E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 34171                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34172                                  	; ds = cs
 34173                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 34174                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 34175                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 34176                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 34177 0000303D A3[6B1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 34178 00003040 8916[6D1F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 34179 00003044 C706[6F1F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 34180 0000304A A3[711F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 34181                                  	; 01/01/2023
 34182                                  	;pop	es ; *
 34183 0000304D C3                      	retn
 34184                                  
 34185                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34186                                  ;
 34187                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 34188                                  ;
 34189                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 34190                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 34191                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 34192                                  ;		   current UMB
 34193                                  ;
 34194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34195                                  
 34196                                  SpaceInUMB:
 34197                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34198                                  	; ds = cs
 34199                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 34200                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 34201                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 34202 0000304E A1[7B1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 34203 00003051 0306[791F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 34204 00003055 2B06[7D1F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 34205                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34206                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 34207                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 34208                                  	;stc
 34209                                  	;retn
 34210                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34211 00003059 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 34212 0000305C 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 34213                                  spcinumb1:
 34214 0000305E 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 34215                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34216                                  	; ds = cs
 34217 0000305F 3B06[691F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 34218                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 34219                                  spcinumb2:
 34220 00003063 C3                      	retn
 34221                                  
 34222                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34223                                  ;
 34224                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 34225                                  ;
 34226                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 34227                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 34228                                  ;
 34229                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34230                                  
 34231                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34232                                  ;
 34233                                  ;PrepareMark:
 34234                                  ;	push	ds
 34235                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 34236                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 34237                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 34238                                  ;	pop	ds
 34239                                  ;
 34240                                  ;	inc	ax
 34241                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 34242                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 34243                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 34244                                  ;	retn

 34246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34247                                  ;
 34248                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 34249                                  ;
 34250                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 34251                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 34252                                  ;		 the device.
 34253                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 34254                                  ;
 34255                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 34256                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 34257                                  ;	UMB.
 34258                                  ;
 34259                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 34260                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 34261                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 34262                                  ;
 34263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34264                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34265                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 34266                                  
 34267                                  GetUMBForDev:
 34268                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34269                                  	; ds = cs
 34270 00003064 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 34271 00003067 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 34272 0000306A CD21                    	int	21h
 34273                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 34274                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 34275                                  
 34276 0000306C 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 34277                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 34278                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34279 0000306E 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 34280                                  
 34281 00003070 4B                      	dec	bx
 34282                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34283                                  	; ds = cs
 34284 00003071 391E[691F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 34285                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 34286 00003075 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 34287                                  
 34288 00003077 43                      	inc	bx
 34289                                  
 34290 00003078 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 34291 0000307B CD21                    	int	21h
 34292 0000307D 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 34293                                  
 34294                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34295                                  	;dec	ax
 34296                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 34297                                  	;
 34298                                  PrepareMark:
 34299 0000307F 1E                      	push	ds
 34300 00003080 48                      	dec	ax
 34301 00003081 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34302 00003083 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 34303 00003089 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 34304 0000308F 40                      	inc	ax
 34305 00003090 1F                      	pop	ds
 34306                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34307                                  	; ds = cs
 34308                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 34309                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 34310                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 34311                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 34312 00003091 891E[7B1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 34313 00003095 A3[791F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 34314 00003098 A3[7D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 34315                                  	;
 34316                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34317                                  	; cf=0
 34318                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 34319 0000309B C3                      	retn
 34320                                  
 34321                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34322                                  %if 1
 34323                                  gufd_err:
 34324 0000309C 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 34325                                  gufd_error:
 34326 0000309E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 34327 000030A0 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 34328 000030A1 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 34329                                  %endif
 34330                                  
 34331                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34332                                  %if 0
 34333                                  gufd_err:
 34334                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 34335                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34336                                  	; ds = cs
 34337                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 34338                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 34339                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 34340                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 34341                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 34342                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 34343                                  	stc
 34344                                  	retn
 34345                                  %endif

 34347                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34348                                  ;
 34349                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 34350                                  ;
 34351                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 34352                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 34353                                  ;
 34354                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 34355                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 34356                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 34357                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 34358                                  ;
 34359                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 34360                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 34361                                  ;
 34362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34363                                  
 34364                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34365                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 34366                                  
 34367                                  DevSetMark:
 34368 000030A3 06                      	push	es
 34369                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34370                                  	;push	di
 34371 000030A4 1E                      	push	ds
 34372 000030A5 56                      	push	si
 34373 000030A6 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34374 000030A8 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 34375 000030AE 40                      	inc	ax
 34376 000030AF 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 34377                                  
 34378                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 34379                                  
 34380 000030B3 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 34381                                  
 34382                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34383                                  	; ds = cs
 34384                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 34385 000030B4 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 34386                                  
 34387 000030B8 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34388 000030BA FC                      	cld
 34389                                  dsm_again:
 34390 000030BB AC                      	lodsb
 34391 000030BC 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 34392 000030BE 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 34393 000030C0 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34394 000030C2 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 34395                                  isit_slash:
 34396 000030C4 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 34397 000030C6 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 34398 000030C8 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34399 000030CA EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 34400                                  isit_null:
 34401 000030CC 08C0                    	or	al,al
 34402 000030CE 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 34403 000030D0 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 34404                                  
 34405 000030D2 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 34406 000030D5 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 34407                                  dsm_next_char:
 34408 000030D8 AC                      	lodsb
 34409 000030D9 08C0                    	or	al, al
 34410 000030DB 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 34411 000030DD 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 34412 000030DF 7403                    	je	short blankout
 34413 000030E1 AA                      	stosb
 34414 000030E2 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 34415                                  blankout:
 34416 000030E4 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 34417 000030E6 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 34418 000030E8 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 34419                                  dsm_exit:
 34420 000030EA 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 34421 000030EB 5E                      	pop	si
 34422 000030EC 1F                      	pop	ds
 34423                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34424                                  	;pop	di
 34425 000030ED 07                      	pop	es
 34426 000030EE C3                      	retn

 34429                                  ;
 34430                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 34431                                  ;
 34432                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 34433                                  ;
 34434                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 34435                                  ;
 34436                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 34437                                  ;	in DevSize
 34438                                  ;
 34439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 34466                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 34467 0000311B EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 34468                                  sd_ctp:	
 34469                                  	; 22/07/2023
 34470                                  ;szdev1:

 34487                                  	; 22/07/2023

 34489                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 34490

 34492                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34493                                  	; cf=0
 34494                                  	;clc

 34510                                  ;

 34512                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 34513                                  ;

 34879                                  ;
 34880                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34881                                  ;
 34882                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34883                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34884                                  ;
 34885                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 34886                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34887                                  ;
 34888                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34889                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34890                                  ;
 34891                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34892                                  
 34893                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34894                                  
 34895                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34896                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34897                                  
 34898                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34899                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34900                                  GetHexNum:
 34901 00003227 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34902 00003229 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34903                                  ghn_next:
 34904 0000322B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34905 0000322E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34906 00003231 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34907 00003233 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34908 00003236 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34909 00003238 50                      	push	ax
 34910 00003239 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34911 0000323B E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 34912 0000323E 58                      	pop	ax
 34913                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34914 0000323F B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34915 00003242 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34916 00003244 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34917                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34918                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34919 00003247 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34920                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34921                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34922                                  ghn_shift1:
 34923 00003249 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34924 0000324B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34925 0000324D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34926 0000324F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34927 00003251 46                      	inc	si
 34928 00003252 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34929                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34930 00003254 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34931 00003257 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34932 0000325A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34933 0000325E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34934                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34935                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34936                                  ghn_shift2:
 34937 00003260 F8                      	clc
 34938 00003261 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34939 00003263 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34940 00003265 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34941 00003267 F8                      	clc
 34942 00003268 C3                      	retn
 34943                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34944                                  ghn_err:
 34945                                  gnib_err:
 34946 00003269 F9                      	stc
 34947                                  ghn_ret:
 34948                                  gnib_ret:
 34949 0000326A C3                      	retn

 34953                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34954                                  ;
 34955                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34956                                  ;
 34957                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34958                                  ;
 34959                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34960                                  ;
 34961                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34962                                  
 34963                                  GetNibble:
 34964 0000326B 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34965                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34966                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34967 0000326E 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34968 00003270 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34969 00003273 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34970 00003275 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34971 00003278 C3                      	retn
 34972                                  is_it_hex:
 34973 00003279 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34974                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 34976 0000327C 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34977 0000327E 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34978 00003281 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34979 00003283 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34980 00003286 C3                      	retn

 34984                                  ;	stc
 34985                                  ;gnib_ret:

 35000                                  
 35001                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35002                                  ;
 35003                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 35004                                  ;
 35005                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 35006                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 35007                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 35008                                  ;			; DS = data
 35009                                  ;
 35010                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 35011                                  ;
 35012                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 35013                                  ;
 35014                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35015                                  
 35016                                  umb_insert:
 35017 00003287 1E                      	push	ds
 35018                                  
 35019                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35020                                  	; ds = cs
 35021                                  
 35022                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35023 00003288 8E1E[961F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 35024                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 35025 0000328C 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 35026 00003290 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 35027 00003292 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35028                                  ui_next:
 35029 00003294 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 35030                                  					;    new block
 35031 00003296 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 35032                                  					; Q: is current block the
 35033                                  					;    last
 35034 00003298 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35035 0000329E 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 35036                                  					; N: get next block
 35037 000032A0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 35038                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 35039 000032A2 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35040 000032A5 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 35041                                  
 35042                                  ui_insert:
 35043 000032A7 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 35044 000032A9 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 35045                                  
 35046 000032AA 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 35047 000032AC F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 35048                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 35049 000032AE C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35050                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 35051 000032B3 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35052                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 35053 000032B9 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 35054                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 35055 000032BD C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35056                                  
 35057                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35058                                  
 35059 000032C3 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35060 000032C5 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35061 000032CB 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 35062                                  					; mark as free
 35063 000032D2 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 35064                                  					; start & end of new block
 35065 000032D5 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 35066                                  
 35067                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 35068                                  	
 35069 000032DA 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 35070 000032DC 43                      	inc	bx
 35071 000032DD 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 35072 000032DF 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 35073                                  
 35074                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 35075                                  					; this block
 35076 000032E0 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 35077                                  	
 35078 000032E2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35079 000032E8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35080 000032EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35081 000032F3 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35082                                  
 35083 000032FA EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 35084                                  
 35085                                  ui_append:
 35086                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 35087 000032FC 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 35088 00003301 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 35089                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 35090                                  					; block for the next arena.
 35091                                  	; 13/05/2019
 35092 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35093                                  
 35094 0000330D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 35095 0000330F 40                      	inc	ax
 35096 00003310 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 35097                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 35098 00003312 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35099                                  
 35100 00003314 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 35101                                  
 35102 00003316 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35103 0000331C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35104 00003323 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35105 00003327 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 35106                                  
 35107                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35108 0000332E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35109 00003330 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 35110 00003336 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 35111                                  					; mark as free
 35112 0000333D 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35113 0000333E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35114                                  ui_done:
 35115                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 35116 00003343 1F                      	pop	ds

 35146                                  ;	retn

 35149                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 35150                                  
 35151                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35152                                  
 35153                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35154                                  
 35155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35156                                  ;
 35157                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 35158                                  ;
 35159                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 35160                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 35161                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 35162                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 35163                                  ;
 35164                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35165                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 35166                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 35167                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 35168                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 35169                                  ;
 35170                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35171                                  
 35172                                  umb_coalesce:
 35173                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35174                                  	; ds = cs
 35175 00003354 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 35176                                  
 35177 00003355 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 35178                                  
 35179                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35180                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35181 00003357 8E06[961F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35182 0000335B 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 35183                                  uc_nextfree:
 35184 00003360 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35185 00003362 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35186                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 35187 00003364 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 35188 00003369 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 35189                                  					; N: get next arena
 35190 0000336B E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35191 0000336E 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35192 00003370 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 35193                                  uc_again:
 35194 00003372 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35195 00003375 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35196                                  uc_check:
 35197 00003377 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 35198 0000337C 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 35199                                  					; Y: coalesce
 35200 0000337E 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 35201 00003383 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 35202                                  	;add	[3],cx
 35203 00003384 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 35204 00003388 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 35205 0000338B 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 35206 0000338D EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 35207                                  
 35208                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35209                                  ;uc_done:
 35210                                  	;retn

 35235                                  	; 31/12/2022

 35261                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 35262                                  ;
 35263                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 35264                                  ;
 35265                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 35266                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 35267                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 35268                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 35269                                  ;				NC
 35270                                  ;			  else 
 35271                                  ;				CY
 35272                                  ;
 35273                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 35274                                  ;
 35275                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35276                                  
 35277                                  umb_allocate:
 35278                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35279                                  	; ds = cs

 35283                                  					;   possible
 35284                                  	; 31/12/2022

 35286                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35287                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 35288                                  					; the largest UMB
 35289 000033C7 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 35290 000033C9 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 35291                                  	
 35292 000033CB B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 35293                                  
 35294                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35295 000033CD FF1E[7F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]

 35297

 35299                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 35300                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35301 000033D4 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 35302                                  ua_err:
 35303 000033D6 F9                      	stc	
 35304                                  
 35305                                  	;clc
 35306                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35307                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35308                                  	; cf=0
 35309                                  	;clc 
 35310                                  ua_done:
 35311 000033D7 58                      	pop	ax
 35312 000033D8 C3                      	retn
 35313                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35314                                  ;ua_err:
 35315                                  	;stc

 35319                                  ;
 35320                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 35321                                  ;
 35322                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
