 37504 00003C0F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37505 00003C10 E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 37506 00003C13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37507 00003C14 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37508                                  copyblock_check:
 37509 00003C15 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37510 00003C17 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 37511 00003C19 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37512 00003C1C EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 37513                                  
 37514                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 37515 00003C1E E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 37516 00003C21 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 37517 00003C24 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37518 00003C26 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37519 00003C28 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 37520 00003C2A 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 37521 00003C2C EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 37522                                  ;
 37523                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 37524                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 37525                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 37526                                  ;
 37527                                  move_config:
 37528 00003C2E 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 37529 00003C30 51                              push    cx              ;
 37530                                  ;
 37531                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 37532                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 37533                                  ;
 37534                                   	;mov	cx,7
 37535 00003C31 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 37536 00003C34 BE[4D47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 37537 00003C37 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 37538                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 37539                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 37540                                  copy_boot: 
 37541                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 37542 00003C38 2E                              cs
 37543 00003C39 AC                      	lodsb
 37544 00003C3A 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 37545 00003C3C 47                              inc     di              ;
 37546 00003C3D E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 37547                                  
 37548 00003C3F 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 37549                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 37550                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37551 00003C40 B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 37552 00003C42 2E8B36[1747]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 37553 00003C47 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 37554 00003C49 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 37555 00003C4B 0E                              push    cs              ;
 37556 00003C4C 07                              pop     es              ;
 37557 00003C4D BE[5A47]                        mov     si,szCommon
 37558 00003C50 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 37559 00003C53 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 37560 00003C56 7406                            je	short l2	;
 37561 00003C58 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37562 00003C5A 46                              inc     si              ;
 37563 00003C5B 47                              inc     di              ;
 37564 00003C5C E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 37565 00003C5E C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 37566 00003C61 07                              pop     es              ;
 37567                                  
 37568                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 37569                                  
 37570 00003C62 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37571 00003C64 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37572 00003C69 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37573 00003C6B 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 37574                                  
 37575 00003C6C 51                              push    cx              ;
 37576 00003C6D F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 37577 00003C6F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37578 00003C70 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 37579 00003C72 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37580                                  
 37581                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 37582                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 37583                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 37584                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 37585                                  ;   is empty.
 37586                                  
 37587 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;
 37588 00003C74 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37589 00003C76 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 37590 00003C77 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 37591 00003C7D E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37592 00003C80 07                              pop     es
 37593                                  
 37594                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 37595                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 37596                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 37597                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 37598                                  
 37599                                  menu_done:
 37600 00003C81 803E[0C47]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 37601 00003C86 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 37602 00003C88 06                              push    es              ;
 37603 00003C89 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 37604 00003C8C 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37605 00003C8E A1[1247]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 37606 00003C91 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 37607 00003C95 A0[1147]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 37608 00003C98 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 37609 00003C9C 07                              pop     es              ;
 37610                                  menu_exit:
 37611 00003C9D 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 37612 00003CA1 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 37613                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 37614                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 37615                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 37616                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 37617 00003CA5 C3                      	retn
 37618                                  
 37619                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 37620                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 37621                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 37622                                  
 37623                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37624                                  ;
 37625                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37626                                  ;
 37627                                  ;   INPUT
 37628                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 37629                                  ;
 37630                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37631                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 37632                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 37633                                  ;
 37634                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37635                                  ;       None
 37636                                  ;
 37637                                  ;   NOTES
 37638                                  ;       None
 37639                                  ;
 37640                                  ;   HISTORY
 37641                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37642                                  ;
 37643                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37644                                  
 37645                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37646                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37647                                  
 37648                                  copy_envvar:
 37649 00003CA6 51                              push    cx              ;
 37650 00003CA7 56                              push    si              ;
 37651 00003CA8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37652 00003CA9 06                              push    es              ;
 37653 00003CAA 06                              push    es              ;
 37654 00003CAB 8E06[BE14]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37655 00003CAF 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37656                                  
 37657                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37658                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37659                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37660                                  ;
 37661                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37662                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37663                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37664                                  
 37665 00003CB0 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37666                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37667 00003CB2 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37668 00003CB3 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37669                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37670 00003CB5 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37671 00003CB7 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37672                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37673 00003CB9 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37674 00003CBB 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37675                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37676 00003CBD 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37677 00003CBF 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37678 00003CC0 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37679 00003CC2 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37680 00003CC4 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37681 00003CC6 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37682 00003CC8 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37683 00003CCA 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37684 00003CCB 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37685                                  copy_varsrch:
 37686 00003CCD 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37687 00003CD0 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37688 00003CD2 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37689 00003CD4 51                              push    cx              ;
 37690 00003CD5 56                              push    si              ;
 37691 00003CD6 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37692 00003CD8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37693 00003CD9 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37694 00003CDA 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37695 00003CDC 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37696 00003CE0 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37697                                  
 37698                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37699                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37700                                  
 37701 00003CE2 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37702 00003CE5 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37703 00003CE7 56                              push    si              ;
 37704 00003CE8 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37705 00003CEA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37706 00003CEC 2E8B0E[BC14]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37707 00003CF1 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37708                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37709                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37710                                  
 37711 00003CF3 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37712 00003CF4 26                      	es	; 26h
 37713 00003CF5 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37714                                  
 37715 00003CF6 5E                      	pop     si
 37716                                  copy_envprep:
 37717 00003CF7 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37718 00003CFA 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37719 00003CFC 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37720 00003CFF 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37721                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37722                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37723                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37724 00003D01 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37725 00003D02 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37726 00003D04 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37727 00003D06 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37728 00003D08 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37729 00003D0A AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37730 00003D0B EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37731                                  
 37732                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37733 00003D0D 51                              push    cx              ;
 37734 00003D0E B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37735 00003D11 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37736 00003D13 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37737 00003D14 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37738                                  
 37739                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37740                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37741                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37742                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37743                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37744                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37745                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37746                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37747                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37748                                  
 37749                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37750 00003D16 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37751 00003D18 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37752                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37753 00003D19 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37754 00003D1C 2E893E[BC14]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37755                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37756 00003D21 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37757                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37758 00003D22 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37759 00003D23 07                              pop     es              ;
 37760 00003D24 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37761 00003D25 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37762 00003D26 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37763                                  
 37764                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37765 00003D27 C3                              retn
 37766                                  
 37767                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37768                                  ;
 37769                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37770                                  ;
 37771                                  ;   INPUT
 37772                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37773                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37774                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37775                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37776                                  ;
 37777                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37778                                  ;       Same as above
 37779                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37780                                  ;
 37781                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37782                                  ;       All
 37783                                  ;
 37784                                  ;   NOTES
 37785                                  ;       None
 37786                                  ;
 37787                                  ;   HISTORY
 37788                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37789                                  ;
 37790                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37791                                  
 37792                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37793                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37794                                  
 37795                                  copy_block:
 37796 00003D28 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37797 00003D2B 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37798 00003D2D 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37799 00003D2F 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37800 00003D31 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37801                                  
 37802 00003D33 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37803 00003D35 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37804 00003D37 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37805                                  
 37806                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37807                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37808                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37809                                  
 37810 00003D39 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37811 00003D3E 57                              push    di              ;
 37812                                  
 37813 00003D3F BF[5547]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37814 00003D42 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37815 00003D45 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37816                                  
 37817 00003D47 BF[5A47]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37818 00003D4A E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37819 00003D4D 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37820                                  
 37821 00003D4F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37822 00003D51 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37823 00003D54 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37824                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37825                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37826 00003D56 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37827 00003D58 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37828 00003D59 51                              push    cx              ;
 37829 00003D5A 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37830 00003D5C 56                              push    si              ;
 37831 00003D5D 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37832 00003D5E 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37833 00003D60 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37834 00003D63 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37835 00003D66 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37836 00003D67 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37837 00003D68 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37838 00003D6A EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37839                                  
 37840                                  copy_error:
 37841                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37842 00003D6C F8                      	clc
 37843                                  copy_skip:
 37844 00003D6D 5F                              pop     di
 37845                                  ;copy_error:
 37846                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37847                                  	;clc                    ;
 37848 00003D6E E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37849 00003D71 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37850                                  
 37851                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37852                                  
 37853                                  copy_line:
 37854 00003D73 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37855 00003D75 47                              inc     di              ;
 37856 00003D76 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37857 00003D78 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37858 00003D7A 2E803E[C114]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37859 00003D80 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37860 00003D82 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37861 00003D85 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37862 00003D87 47                              inc     di              ;
 37863 00003D88 47                              inc     di              ;
 37864 00003D89 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37865                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37866 00003D8B E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37867 00003D8E 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37868 00003D90 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37869 00003D92 47                              inc     di              ;
 37870                                  copy_next:
 37871 00003D93 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37872 00003D95 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37873                                  
 37874                                  copy_nextline:
 37875 00003D97 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37876 00003D9A EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37877                                  
 37878                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37879                                  ;copy_done:
 37880                                          ;retn
 37881                                  
 37882                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37883                                  ;
 37884                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37885                                  ;
 37886                                  ;   INPUT
 37887                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37888                                  ;
 37889                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37890                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37891                                  ;
 37892                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37893                                  ;       DX
 37894                                  ;
 37895                                  ;   NOTES
 37896                                  ;       None
 37897                                  ;
 37898                                  ;   HISTORY
 37899                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37900                                  ;
 37901                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37902                                  
 37903                                  get_linenum:
 37904 00003D9C 50                              push    ax              ;
 37905 00003D9D 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37906 00003D9F 51                              push    cx              ;
 37907 00003DA0 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37908 00003DA2 56                              push    si              ;
 37909 00003DA3 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37910 00003DA8 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37911                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37912 00003DAA E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37913 00003DAD 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37914 00003DAF 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37915 00003DB0 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37916 00003DB2 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37917                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37918 00003DB4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37919 00003DB5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37920 00003DB6 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37921 00003DB7 C3                              retn
 37922                                  
 37923                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37924                                  ;
 37925                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37926                                  ;
 37927                                  ;   INPUT
 37928                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37929                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37930                                  ;
 37931                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37932                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37933                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37934                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37935                                  ;
 37936                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37937                                  ;       None
 37938                                  ;
 37939                                  ;   NOTES
 37940                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37941                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37942                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37943                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37944                                  ;
 37945                                  ;   HISTORY
 37946                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37947                                  ;
 37948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37949                                  
 37950                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37951 00003DB8 50                              push    ax              ;
 37952 00003DB9 51                              push    cx              ;
 37953 00003DBA 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37954 00003DBF 56                              push    si              ;
 37955 00003DC0 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37956 00003DC2 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37957 00003DC3 06                              push    es              ;
 37958 00003DC4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37959 00003DC5 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37960 00003DC8 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37961 00003DCA 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37962 00003DCC 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37963 00003DCD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37964 00003DCE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37965 00003DCF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37966                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37967 00003DD0 C3                              retn			;
 37968                                  
 37969                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37970                                  ;
 37971                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37972                                  ;
 37973                                  ;   INPUT
 37974                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37975                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37976                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37977                                  ;
 37978                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37979                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37980                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37981                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37982                                  ;
 37983                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37984                                  ;       AX
 37985                                  ;
 37986                                  ;   NOTES
 37987                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37988                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37989                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37990                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37991                                  ;
 37992                                  ;   HISTORY
 37993                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37994                                  ;
 37995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37996                                  
 37997                                  find_block:
 37998 00003DD1 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37999 00003DD4 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 38000 00003DD6 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 38001 00003DD8 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 38002 00003DDA 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 38003 00003DDC 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 38004 00003DDE 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 38005 00003DE0 2E800E[C114]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 38006 00003DE6 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 38007                                  check_line:
 38008 00003DE8 2E800E[C114]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 38009 00003DEE E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 38010 00003DF1 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 38011                                  next_line:
 38012 00003DF3 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 38013 00003DF6 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 38014                                  ;find_exit:
 38015                                  ;	retn
 38016                                  
 38017                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38018                                  ;
 38019                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 38020                                  ;
 38021                                  ;   INPUT
 38022                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 38023                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38024                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38025                                  ;
 38026                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38027                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 38028                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 38029                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38030                                  ;
 38031                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38032                                  ;       AX
 38033                                  ;
 38034                                  ;   NOTES
 38035                                  ;       None
 38036                                  ;
 38037                                  ;   HISTORY
 38038                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38039                                  ;
 38040                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38041                                  
 38042                                  comp_names:
 38043 00003DF8 57                              push    di              ;
 38044                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 38045 00003DF9 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 38046 00003DFC 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 38047 00003DFE E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 38048 00003E01 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 38049 00003E03 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 38050 00003E05 47                              inc     di              ;
 38051 00003E06 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 38052                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 38053 00003E09 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 38054 00003E0B 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 38055 00003E0D F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 38056                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 38057 00003E0E 5F                              pop     di              ;
 38058 00003E0F C3                              retn			;
 38059                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 38060 00003E10 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 38061 00003E12 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 38062 00003E15 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 38063 00003E17 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 38064                                  
 38065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38066                                  
 38067                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38068                                  comp_names_x:
 38069                                  	;
 38070                                  comp_names_safe:
 38071 00003E19 50                              push    ax
 38072 00003E1A 51                              push    cx
 38073 00003E1B 56                              push	si
 38074 00003E1C 1E                              push    ds
 38075 00003E1D 0E                              push    cs
 38076 00003E1E 1F                              pop     ds
 38077 00003E1F E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 38078 00003E22 1F                              pop     ds
 38079 00003E23 5E                      	pop	si
 38080 00003E24 59                              pop     cx
 38081 00003E25 58                              pop     ax
 38082 00003E26 C3                              retn
 38083                                  
 38084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38085                                  ;
 38086                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 38087                                  ;
 38088                                  ;   INPUT
 38089                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 38090                                  ;
 38091                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38092                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 38093                                  ;
 38094                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38095                                  ;       None
 38096                                  ;
 38097                                  ;   NOTES
 38098                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 38099                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 38100                                  ;
 38101                                  ;   HISTORY
 38102                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38103                                  ;
 38104                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38105                                  
 38106                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38107                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 38108                                  
 38109                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 38110 00003E27 50                              push    ax              ;
 38111 00003E28 53                              push    bx              ;
 38112 00003E29 51                              push    cx              ;
 38113 00003E2A 52                              push    dx              ;
 38114 00003E2B 56                              push    si              ;
 38115 00003E2C B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38116 00003E2E 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 38117 00003E32 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 38118 00003E34 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38119 00003E35 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38120 00003E37 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 38121 00003E39 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 38122 00003E3C B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 38123 00003E3E CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 38124 00003E40 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38125 00003E42 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 38126 00003E44 8A26[0B47]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 38127 00003E48 3A1E[1547]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 38128 00003E4C 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38129 00003E4E 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 38130 00003E51 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 38131 00003E53 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 38132 00003E55 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 38133 00003E57 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 38134 00003E59 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38135 00003E5B 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 38136                                  print_other:                    ;
 38137 00003E5E B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 38138 00003E60 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 38139 00003E62 8BBF[3947]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 38140 00003E66 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 38141 00003E68 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 38142 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 38143 00003E6E B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 38144 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38145 00003E73 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38146 00003E75 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38147 00003E77 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38148                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 38149 00003E79 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 38150 00003E7C CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 38151 00003E7E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38152 00003E80 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38153 00003E82 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38154                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 38155 00003E84 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 38156 00003E87 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 38157 00003E89 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38158 00003E8B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38159 00003E8D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38160 00003E8F 06                              push    es              ;
 38161                                  print_loop:                     ;
 38162 00003E90 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 38163 00003E93 47                              inc     di              ;
 38164 00003E94 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 38165 00003E96 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 38166 00003E98 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 38167                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 38168 00003E9A 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 38169 00003E9C 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 38170 00003E9E 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 38171 00003EA0 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 38172 00003EA2 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 38173 00003EA4 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38174 00003EA6 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38175 00003EA8 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 38176 00003EAB 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 38177 00003EAD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38178 00003EAF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38179 00003EB1 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 38180                                  print_done:                     ;
 38181 00003EB3 07                              pop     es              ;
 38182 00003EB4 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38183 00003EB5 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38184 00003EB7 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 38185 00003EB9 5E                              pop     si              ;
 38186 00003EBA 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38187 00003EBB 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38188 00003EBC 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38189 00003EBD 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38190 00003EBE C3                              retn			;
 38191                                  
 38192                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38193                                  ;
 38194                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 38195                                  ;
 38196                                  ;   INPUT
 38197                                  ;       None
 38198                                  ;
 38199                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38200                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 38201                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 38202                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 38203                                  ;
 38204                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38205                                  ;       None
 38206                                  ;
 38207                                  ;   NOTES
 38208                                  ;       None
 38209                                  ;
 38210                                  ;   HISTORY
 38211                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38212                                  ;
 38213                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38214                                  
 38215                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 38216 00003EBF 8A1E[1547]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 38217 00003EC3 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38218 00003EC5 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 38219 00003EC8 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 38220 00003ECB 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 38221 00003ED0 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 38222 00003ED2 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 38223 00003ED4 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38224 00003ED6 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 38225                                  check_time:
 38226 00003ED8 A0[1947]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 38227 00003EDB 2A06[1A47]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 38228 00003EDF 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 38229 00003EE1 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 38230 00003EE6 C606[1A47]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 38231 00003EEB E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 38232                                  show_time:
 38233 00003EEE 53                              push    bx              ;
 38234 00003EEF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 38235 00003EF1 8A3E[0C47]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 38236 00003EF5 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38237 00003EF7 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38238 00003EF9 52                              push    dx              ;
 38239 00003EFA 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 38240 00003EFD B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38241 00003EFF CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38242 00003F01 BA[CE4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 38243 00003F04 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 38244 00003F07 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 38245 00003F09 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 38246 00003F0A B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 38247 00003F0C F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 38248 00003F0E 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 38249 00003F10 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38250 00003F12 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38251 00003F14 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 38252 00003F16 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 38253 00003F18 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38254 00003F1A B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38255 00003F1C CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 38256 00003F1E 5A                              pop     dx
 38257 00003F1F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 38258 00003F21 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38259 00003F23 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38260                                  input_key:
 38261 00003F24 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 38262 00003F26 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 38263 00003F28 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38264 00003F2A 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 38265 00003F2C 803E[1947]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 38266 00003F31 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 38267 00003F33 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 38268 00003F35 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 38269 00003F37 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 38270 00003F39 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 38271 00003F3B 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 38272 00003F3D 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 38273 00003F3F B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 38274                                  got_time:
 38275 00003F41 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 38276 00003F43 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 38277 00003F45 0036[1A47]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 38278 00003F49 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 38279                                  got_key:
 38280 00003F4B 50                              push    ax              ;
 38281 00003F4C B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 38282 00003F4F 8706[1947]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 38283 00003F53 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 38284 00003F55 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 38285 00003F57 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 38286 00003F58 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38287 00003F5B 8B1E[0B47]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38288 00003F5F B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 38289 00003F62 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 38290 00003F64 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 38291                                  
 38292                                  timeout_disabled:
 38293 00003F65 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38294 00003F66 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 38295 00003F68 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 38296 00003F6A CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 38297 00003F6C 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 38298                                  
 38299 00003F6E 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 38300 00003F70 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 38301 00003F72 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 38302 00003F75 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 38303 00003F77 FE0E[1547]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38304 00003F7B E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38305 00003F7E FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 38306 00003F80 EB12                            jmp     short print1
 38307                                  not_up:
 38308 00003F82 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 38309 00003F84 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 38310 00003F86 3A1E[1647]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 38311 00003F8A 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 38312 00003F8C FE06[1547]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38313 00003F90 E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38314 00003F93 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 38315                                  print1: 
 38316 00003F94 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 38317                                  print2: 
 38318 00003F96 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 38319 00003F99 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 38320                                  to_input_key:
 38321 00003F9C EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 38322                                  not_down:
 38323 00003F9E F606[1047]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38324 00003FA3 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 38325 00003FA5 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 38326 00003FA7 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 38327 00003FA9 8036[1447]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38328 00003FAE E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 38329 00003FB1 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 38330                                  not_f8:
 38331 00003FB4 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 38332 00003FB6 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 38333                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38334                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 38335                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 38336 00003FB8 800E[1447]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 38337 00003FBD BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 38338 00003FC0 B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 38339 00003FC2 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 38340                                  
 38341                                  normal_key:
 38342 00003FC4 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 38343 00003FC6 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 38344 00003FC8 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 38345 00003FCA 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 38346 00003FCC BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 38347 00003FCF C3                              retn			;
 38348                                  not_backspace:
 38349 00003FD0 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 38350 00003FD2 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 38351 00003FD4 3A06[1647]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 38352 00003FD8 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 38353 00003FDA A2[1547]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 38354 00003FDD E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 38355 00003FE0 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 38356 00003FE2 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 38357                                  
 38358                                  select_done:

 38360 00003FE6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38361 00003FE8 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 38362                                  
 38363                                  	; fall into disp_input
 38364

 38368                                  ;
 38369                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 38370                                  ;
 38371                                  ;   INPUT

 38373                                  ;
 38374                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38375                                  ;       None
 38376                                  ;
 38377                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38378                                  ;       None
 38379                                  ;
 38380                                  ;   NOTES
 38381                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 38382                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 38383                                  ;
 38384                                  ;   HISTORY
 38385                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38386                                  ;

 38396 00003FEB B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 38397 00003FED 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 38398 00003FEF 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 38399                                  disp_ok:
 38400 00003FF1 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 38401                                  disp_input_ok:

 38403 00003FF5 CD21                    	int	21h

 38405 00003FFA E8E504                  	call	print
 38406 00003FFD 58                      	pop	ax
 38407 00003FFE C3                      	retn

 38418 0000400D 5B                              pop     bx

 38443 0000400F 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #

 38459                                  show_onoff:

 38461                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 38462                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 38463                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
