 38484                                  ;
 38485                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 38486                                  ;
 38487                                  ;   INPUT
 38488                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38489                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38490                                  ;
 38491                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38492                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 38493                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 38494                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 38495                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38496                                  ;
 38497                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38498                                  ;       AX
 38499                                  ;
 38500                                  ;   NOTES
 38501                                  ;       None
 38502                                  ;
 38503                                  ;   HISTORY
 38504                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38505                                  ;
 38506                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38507                                  
 38508                                  skip_token:
 38509 0000404C E84D00                          call    get_char
 38510 0000404F 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 38511 00004051 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 38512 00004054 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 38513                                  skip_check_eol:
 38514 00004056 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 38515 00004058 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38516 0000405A 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38517 0000405C 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38518 0000405E F8                              clc
 38519                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 38520 0000405F C3                      	retn
 38521                                  skip_token_eol:
 38522 00004060 F9                              stc
 38523                                  skip_token_done:
 38524 00004061 C3                              retn
 38525                                  
 38526                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38527                                  ;
 38528                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 38529                                  ;
 38530                                  ;   INPUT
 38531                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38532                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38533                                  ;
 38534                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38535                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38536                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 38537                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 38538                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38539                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 38540                                  ;
 38541                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38542                                  ;       AX
 38543                                  ;
 38544                                  ;   NOTES
 38545                                  ;       None
 38546                                  ;
 38547                                  ;   HISTORY
 38548                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38549                                  ;
 38550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38551                                  
 38552                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 38553 00004062 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 38554 00004065 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 38555 00004068 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 38556 0000406A E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 38557 0000406D 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 38558 0000406F EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 38559                                  
 38560                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38561                                  ;
 38562                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 38563                                  ;
 38564                                  ;   INPUT
 38565                                  ;       AL == last character read
 38566                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38567                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38568                                  ;
 38569                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38570                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38571                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 38572                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38573                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38574                                  ;
 38575                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38576                                  ;       AX
 38577                                  ;
 38578                                  ;   NOTES
 38579                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 38580                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 38581                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 38582                                  ;
 38583                                  ;   HISTORY
 38584                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38585                                  ;
 38586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38587                                  
 38588                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38589                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 38590                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38591                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 38592                                       
 38593                                  	; fall into skip_line
 38594                                  
 38595                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38596                                  ;
 38597                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 38598                                  ;
 38599                                  ;   INPUT
 38600                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38601                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38602                                  ;
 38603                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38604                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38605                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38606                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38607                                  ;
 38608                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38609                                  ;       AX
 38610                                  ;
 38611                                  ;   NOTES
 38612                                  ;       None
 38613                                  ;
 38614                                  ;   HISTORY
 38615                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38616                                  ;
 38617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38618                                  
 38619                                  skip_line:
 38620 00004071 E82800                          call    get_char
 38621 00004074 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 38622                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38623 00004076 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38624 00004078 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 38625                                  skip_line_done:
 38626                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38627 0000407A C3                              retn
 38628                                  
 38629                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38630                                  ;
 38631                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 38632                                  ;
 38633                                  ;   INPUT
 38634                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38635                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38636                                  ;
 38637                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38638                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 38639                                  ;       BX == binary #
 38640                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 38641                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38642                                  ;
 38643                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38644                                  ;       AX
 38645                                  ;
 38646                                  ;   NOTES
 38647                                  ;       None
 38648                                  ;
 38649                                  ;   HISTORY
 38650                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38651                                  ;
 38652                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38653                                  
 38654                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38655                                  
 38656                                  get_number:
 38657 0000407B 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38658                                  num_loop:
 38659 0000407D E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38660 00004080 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38661 00004082 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38662 00004084 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38663 00004086 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38664 00004088 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38665 0000408A 50                              push    ax              ;
 38666 0000408B B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38667 0000408E 52                              push    dx              ;
 38668 0000408F F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38669 00004091 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38670 00004092 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38671 00004094 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38672 00004095 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38673 00004097 98                              cbw                     ;
 38674 00004098 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38675 0000409A EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38676                                  
 38677                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38678                                  ;num_done:
 38679                                          ;retn
 38680                                  
 38681                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38682                                  ;
 38683                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38684                                  ;
 38685                                  ;   INPUT
 38686                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38687                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38688                                  ;
 38689                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38690                                  ;       AL == next character
 38691                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38692                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38693                                  ;
 38694                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38695                                  ;       AX
 38696                                  ;
 38697                                  ;   NOTES
 38698                                  ;       None
 38699                                  ;
 38700                                  ;   HISTORY
 38701                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38702                                  ;
 38703                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38704                                  
 38705                                  get_char:
 38706 0000409C 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38707 0000409F 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38708                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38709 000040A1 26                      	es	
 38710 000040A2 AC                      	lodsb
 38711 000040A3 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38712 000040A5 C3                              retn			;
 38713                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38714 000040A6 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38715                                  nearby_ret:
 38716 000040A9 C3                              retn
 38717                                  
 38718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38719                                  ;
 38720                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38721                                  ;
 38722                                  ;   INPUT
 38723                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38724                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38725                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38726                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38727                                  ;
 38728                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38729                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38730                                  ;
 38731                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38732                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38733                                  ;
 38734                                  ;   NOTES
 38735                                  ;       None
 38736                                  ;
 38737                                  ;   HISTORY
 38738                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38739                                  ;
 38740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38741                                  
 38742                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38743                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38744                                  
 38745                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38746                                  query_user:
 38747 000040AA F606[1447]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38748                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38749 000040AF 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38750 000040B1 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38751                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38752                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38753                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38754                                  qu_1:
 38755 000040B4 F606[1447]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38756 000040B9 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38757 000040BB 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38758 000040BC A0[C014]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38759 000040BF F606[1447]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38760 000040C4 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38761 000040C6 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38762                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38763 000040C8 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38764                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38765                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38766                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38767                                  
 38768                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38769 000040CA 58                      	pop	ax
 38770 000040CB C3                      	retn
 38771                                  
 38772                                  query_all:
 38773                                  
 38774                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38775                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38776                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38777                                  
 38778 000040CC 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38779 000040CD BA[204D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38780 000040D0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38781 000040D2 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38782                                  
 38783 000040D4 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38784 000040D6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38785 000040D8 BF[6147]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38786                                  find_match:                             ;
 38787 000040DB 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38788 000040DD 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38789 000040DF 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38790 000040E1 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38791 000040E2 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38792 000040E4 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38793 000040E6 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38794                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38795 000040E9 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38796                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38797 000040EB 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38798 000040EE B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38799 000040F0 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38800                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38801 000040F2 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38802 000040F4 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38803 000040F5 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38804 000040F7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38805 000040F9 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38806 000040FB B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38807 000040FD 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38808 00004100 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38809 00004102 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38810                                  cmd_notset:
 38811 00004104 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38812                                  line_print:                             ;
 38813                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38814 00004106 26                              es
 38815 00004107 AC                      	lodsb
 38816 00004108 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38817 0000410A 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38818 0000410C B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38819                                  non_null:                               ;
 38820 0000410E 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38821 00004110 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38822 00004112 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38823                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38824 00004114 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38825                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38826 00004117 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38827                                  non_space:                              ;
 38828 00004119 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38829 0000411B B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38830 0000411D CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38831 0000411F EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38832                                  
 38833                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38834 00004121 BA[BE4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38835                                  
 38836                                  generic_prompt:
 38837 00004124 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38838                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38839 00004127 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38840 00004129 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38841 0000412B 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38842 0000412D 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38843 0000412F 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38844 00004132 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38845 00004134 A0[CA4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38846 00004137 800E[1447]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38847 0000413C EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38848                                  not_func:
 38849 0000413E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38850 00004140 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38851 00004144 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38852 00004146 3A06[C64C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38853 0000414A 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38854 0000414C 803E[C014]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38855 00004151 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38856 00004153 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38857 00004155 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38858 00004157 800E[1447]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38859 0000415C A0[C64C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38860                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38861 0000415F E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38862 00004162 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38863                                  
 38864 00004163 3A06[CA4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38865 00004167 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38866                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38867 00004169 F8                      	clc
 38868                                  do_cmd:
 38869 0000416A 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38870                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38871                                  	; cf=0
 38872                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38873 0000416B C3                      	retn
 38874                                  
 38875                                  skip_cmd:
 38876 0000416C 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38877                                  skip_all:
 38878 0000416D B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38879 0000416F F9                      	stc
 38880 00004170 C3                      	retn

 39303                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39304                                  ;
 39305                                  ; procedure : getnum
 39306                                  ;
 39307                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 39308                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 39309                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 39310                                  ;
 39311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39312                                  
 39313                                  getnum:
 39314 000042F3 53                      	push	bx
 39315 000042F4 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 39316                                  b2:
 39317 000042F6 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 39318 000042F9 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 39319                                  
 39320 000042FB 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 39321 000042FC 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 39322                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 39323                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39324 000042FD B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 39325 000042FF F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 39326 00004301 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 39327 00004302 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 39328 00004304 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 39329 00004307 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 39330                                  
 39331 00004309 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 39332                                  
 39333 0000430A E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 39334 0000430D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 39335 0000430F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 39336 00004311 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 39337 00004313 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 39338 00004315 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 39339 00004317 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 39340 00004319 7417                    	je	short b15
 39341 0000431B 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 39342 00004320 7410                    	je	short b15
 39343 00004322 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 39344                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39345                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39346                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 39347                                  	;nop
 39348 00004324 740C                    	je	short b15
 39349 00004326 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 39350 00004328 7408                    	je	short b15
 39351 0000432A 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 39352 0000432C 7404                    	je	short b15
 39353 0000432E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 39354 00004330 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 39355                                  b15:
 39356 00004332 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 39357 00004337 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 39358                                  b1:
 39359 0000433C 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 39360 0000433E 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 39361 00004340 5B                      	pop	bx
 39362 00004341 C3                      	retn
 39363                                  badnum:
 39364                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39365                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 39366 00004342 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 39367                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 39368 00004344 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 39369 00004348 5B                      	pop	bx
 39370 00004349 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 39371 0000434A C3                      	retn
 39372                                  
 39373                                  ;****************************************************************************
 39374                                  
 39375                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 39376                                  
 39377                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39378                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 39379                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 39380                                  ;	si = 0
 39381                                  ;	ax = country id
 39382                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 39383                                  ;	bx = file handle
 39384                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 39385                                  ;
 39386                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 39387                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 39388                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 39389                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 39390                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39391                                  
 39392                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39393                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 39394                                  
 39395                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39396                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 39397                                  
 39398 0000434B 57                      	push	di
 39399 0000434C 50                      	push	ax
 39400 0000434D 52                      	push	dx
 39401                                  
 39402 0000434E 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 39403 00004350 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 39404 00004352 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 39405 00004355 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 39406 00004358 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39407                                  
 39408 0000435A 06                      	push	es
 39409 0000435B 56                      	push	si

 39641                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.

 39644                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39645                                  ;on return:
 39646                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39647                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39648                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39649                                  
 39650                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39651                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39652                                  
 39653                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39654                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39655

 39709                                  
 39710                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39711                                  
 39712                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39713                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39714                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39715                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39716                                  ;
 39717                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39718                                  ;	 be moved.
 39719                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39720                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39721                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39722                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39723                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39724                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39725                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39726                                  
 39727 0000449B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39728 0000449C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39729 0000449F F9                      	stc
 39730 000044A0 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39731 000044A2 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39732 000044A3 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39733                                  
 39734 000044A5 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39735 000044A7 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39736 000044A9 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39737 000044AB F9                      	stc
 39738 000044AC CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39739                                  ricb_exit:
 39740 000044AE C3                      	retn

 39744                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39745                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39746                                  %if 0
 39747                                  
 39748                                  set_country_path:
 39749                                  
 39750                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39751                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39752                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39753                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39754                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39755                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39756                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39757                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39758                                  
 39759                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39760                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39761                                  
 39762                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39763                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39764                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39765                                  
 39766                                  	push	si
 39767                                  
 39768                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39769                                  	push	es
 39770                                  	pop	ds
 39771                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39772                                  
 39773                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39774                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39775                                  
 39776                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39777                                  	inc	si
 39778                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39779                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39780                                  
 39781                                  scp_default_drv:
 39782                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39783                                  	int	21h
 39784                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39785                                  
 39786                                  scp_setdrv:
 39787                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39788                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39789                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39790                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39791                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39792                                  
 39793                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39794                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39795                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39796                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39797                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39798                                  
 39799                                  scp_root_dir:
 39800                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39801                                  scp_path:
 39802                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39803                                  
 39804                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39805                                  scpath_exit:
 39806                                  
 39807                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39808                                  	push	es
 39809                                  	pop	ds
 39810                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39811                                  
 39812                                  	pop	si
 39813                                  	retn
 39814                                  
 39815                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39816                                  
 39817                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39818                                  
 39819                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39820                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39821                                  ;carry set if not.
 39822                                  
 39823                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39824                                  
 39825                                  	push	ax
 39826                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39827                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39828                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39829                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39830                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39831                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39832                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39833                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39834                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39835                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39836                                  
 39837                                  cdletter_no:
 39838                                  	stc
 39839                                  cdletter_exit:
 39840                                  	pop	ax
 39841                                  	retn
 39842                                  
 39843                                  %endif

 39917                                  
 39918                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 39919                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 39920                                  
 39921                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39922                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 39923                                  open_dev:
 39924 000044E7 E80500                  	call	open_file
 39925 000044EA 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 39926                                  
 39927                                  open_dev1:
 39928 000044EC BA[5045]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 39929                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39930                                  	;call	open_file
 39931                                  ;of_retn:
 39932                                  	;retn
 39933                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39934                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 39935                                  open_file:
 39936 000044EF B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 39937 000044F1 F9                      	stc
 39938 000044F2 CD21                    	int	21h
 39939                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 39940 000044F4 C3                      	retn
 39941                                  
 39942                                  open_dev3:
 39943 000044F5 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 39944                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 39945                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 39946                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 39947                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39948                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 39949                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 39950                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39951 000044F7 B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 39952                                  
 39953 000044FA CD21                    	int	21h
 39954                                  
 39955 000044FC F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 39956 000044FF 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 39957                                  
 39958 00004501 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 39959 00004503 CD21                    	int	21h
 39960 00004505 EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 39961
